name: Hydrance UV-Rich SPF30
info: Hydrate your skin while protecting it daily against UV, free radicals, and pollution. It's rich, velvety texture leaves the skin soft, supple and luminous all day long.

name: Lipikar AP+M
info: If you have extremely sensitive and dry skin, and it’s been difficult to find a body lotion that actually does the job. By using the Lipikar Balm AP+ from La Roche-Posay for a few months will leave your skin feeling moisturized all day long without having to reapply it every few hours. Plus, it’s really affordable! Win win.

name: Lait-Creme Concentre
info: Embryolisse’s Lait-Crème Concentré is super moisturizing without being too thick or heavy on the surface of the skin and works well all year round. A hero product, indeed!

name: Glow Daily Vitamin C Gel Cream
info: After using this gel-cream for a few months you'll notice how much your skin will glow before you’d even put on makeup. It's the product that will make you feel more confident to go out sans base product.

name: C-Rush Brightening
info: The daily effects of stress, fatigue, and pollution can leave skin looking dry and dull. Fight back with this vegan C-Rush Brightening Gel Crème. This innovative, peachy-tinted gel crème instantly illuminates and delivers an energizing burst of 24-hour hydration.

name: Vita Mineral Daily Supplement
info: This vegan multi-active cream that replenishes the skin with moisture and vital nutrients. Powerful antioxidants, trace elements and vitamins further protect and energise the skin's appearance.

name: Moroccan Rose Otto
info: This vegan body lotion for all skin types designed to nourish and hydrate skin with the delicate fragrance of rose. A light daily moisturiser that literally leaves you smelling like roses? Yes please.

name: Ultra Comforting Reve de Miel
info: This rich face cream with Honey, Propolis and Precious Oils provides intense nourishing, soothes and repairs the skin while protecting it from external aggression. Skin's suppleness and infinite comfort are restored. Rough areas of skin, redness and sensations of irritation and tugging are reduced.

name: Crème Fraiche de Beaute
info: This moisturising cream, for dry skin, with plant milks and algae extract provides 48-hour hydration, soothes and protects the skin from pollution. The skin looks fresh, intensely nourished and velvety all day long.

name: Hand and Nail Cream
info: This silky, non-greasy hand cream with honey, precious oils and vitamin E nourishes and repairs dry and damaged hands while protecting them from premature skin aging. Day after day, hands are softened and the nails are fortified.

name: Daily Essential Moisturiser
info: This bestselling Daily Essential Moisturiser SPF50+ is the perfect way to advocate for your skin, every single day. A lightweight, non-greasy, antioxidant-rich formula that provides optimal sun protection with 5 UVA/UBA filters. Alongside effortless hydration, thanks to Silica and Pro Vitamin B5 with anti-inflammatory benefits from Vitamin E.

name: Skin Recovery Cream
info: Preservative-free, paraben-free, fragrance-free, alcohol-free. Skin Recovery Cream contains parcerine, which acts against irritation and calms the skin. It provides a long lasting barrier against external factors with a minimum of ingredients, selected for the gentleness. The parcerine combined with the soothing and anti-irritating Avène Thermal Spring Water softens your skin while reducing skin reactivity, thus eliminating sensations of tightness.

name: Hydrance Aqua-Gel
info: This complete care, 3-in-one, suits all needs and lifestyles. It hydrates*, soothes and detoxifies the skin, in one easy step. Thanks to its patented** Cohederm complex, that provides intense hydration, Avène Thermal Spring Water with anti-irritating properties that soothes immediately as well as Dextran sulfate and Pre-tocopheryl, that helps fight free radicals. It can be used as a daily moisturiser, as a night mask or as an eye cream

name: Liquid Gold 24H Repair Cream
info: This opulent moisturiser raises the bar. Liquid Gold 24 Hour Moisture Repair Cream works around the clock to transform your skin, calling on 5% Glycolic Acid, Argan Stem Cells, 24 Karat Gold Flakes and a host of other efficacious ingredients to dramatically boost hydration and support regeneration.

name: Essential Hydratation Cream
info: A soothing skin staple, Essential Hydration Cream comprises a unique blend of aromatic essential oils designed to counter the appearance of redness and irritation. Bio-active sea minerals and essential fatty acids help to revitalise and hydrate parched skin.

name: Hyalu B5 Hyaluronic Acid Cream
info: An intensely hydrating cream that helps plump skin, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and improve the quality of skin tone.

name: Nutric Intense Rich Moisturiser
info: A daily solution for very dry and sensitive skin. Nutritic Intense helps to soothe and comfort dry skin, reducing sensations of tightness and helping to reinforce the skin's natural barrier function. Enveloping, rich cream texture.

name: Toleriane Ultra Overnight Sensitive Skin
info: Treat and comfort sensitive skin with La Roche-Posay Toleriane Ultra Overnight Moisturiser, an intensely soothing moisturiser that works to calm and hydrate skin during its most receptive hours.

name: Effaclar H
info: Soothing Compensation Moisturiser. Effaclar H moisturises oily skin that feels weak and fragile. It also provides skin with the lipids it lacks to reconstitute the protective hydrolipidic film. Contains Ceramide 5.

name: Sheer Transformation Perfecting
info: Transform the way you think about your moisturizer, transform your skin. This moisturizer delivers weightless hydration and luminous perfection. With its whipped, silky texture, this bestselling oil-free moisturizer imparts essential moisture to the skin, even as it delivers radiance and helps improves the appearance of dark spots and discoloration.

name: V-Cense Revitalising Night Cream
info: Formulated to recharge, revitalise and intensively hydrate the skin overnight, this multi action cream visibly smoothes fine lines, evens skin tone and offers antioxidant protection to help combat the signs of premature ageing.

name: V-Cense Youth Vitality Day Cream
info: A multi-active moisturiser that prevents and minimises the signs of premature ageing. Its complex of actives intensly hydrates, protects against free radical damage and smoothes fine lines and wrinkles while improving firmness.

name: Evercalm Global Protection Day
info: This best selling moisturiser utilises Global Protection Complex, a synergetic blend of powerful antioxidant and free radical scavengers, together with soothing and nourishing seed oils to help protect the skin against dehydration and pollution, a known contributing factor to visible premature ageing.

name: Hyalu B5 Hyaluronic Acid Serum
info: With continued use, this genuinely makes your skin look like you’ve only drank water and eaten greens for a month. The hyaluronic acid sits in two different molecular sizes; the bigger of the two replumps the surface and the smaller ones penetrates the skin barrier to work from within... it’s all very techy. You will just love how dewy your skin looks tbh.

name: Banana Bright Vitamin C Serum
info: Tell dullness to bounce: This vegan, gluten and cruelty-free serum contains the highest concentration of vitamin C for daily use. It combines vitamin C, exfoliating acids and banana powder-inspired pigments—to help instantly brighten, firm, reduce the look of dark spots, pores and wrinkles and defend skin against pollution, while delivering a sensorial experience you’ll love. And, with hyaluronic acid, this multi-acid serum helps reinforce skin’s moisture barrier.
src: ./images/products/Ole Henriksen Banana Bright™ Vitamin C Serum.jpg

name: Clarins Double Serum
info: This anti-aging treatment enriched with 20+1 plant extracts that uses a hydrolipidic and biomimetic double formula to stimulate five vital functions: hydration, nutrition, oxygenation, regeneration and protection. This multi-tasking serum does it all!

name: Hydrance Intense Serum
info: This serum immediately recharges skin with hydration for 24 hours, so the skin can feel comfortably hydrated and strengthened with every use. In fact, clinical tests have proven that it improves hydration of the skin by 45% even after four hours! For those who suffer from fine lines due to dehydrated skin, you’ll also be delighted to know that this serum can effectively smooth away fine lines in just seven days.

name: Pure Vitamin C10
info: Treat skin to the hydrating, brightening and smoothing properties of La Roche-Posay Pure Vitamin C10 Serum, a lightweight face serum that helps to prevent and correct the appearance of ageing. Skin looks brighter and moisturised with smoother-looking lines. Works as an optimal makeup base. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

name: 0.3% Retinol Vitamin B3 Serum
info: This retinol serum fights the visible signs of ageing with a unique formulation for sensitive skin. Clinically proven to firm, fill & smooth. Specifically formulated for those concerned with dehydration, skin irregularities (complexion) and wrinkles, but also searching for a serum suitable for sensitive skin.

name: Evercalm Anti-Redness Serum
info: Formulated as a protective serum for redness, dryness and irritation-prone skin, this calming formula helps reduce redness and sensitivity by strengthening the skin barrier. It also boosts hydration, while building skin’s resilience over time thanks to its antioxidant and soothing properties.

name: Bio Retinoid Anti-Ageing Concentrate
info: Revitalise your skin with a potent blend of natural oils and vitamins designed to combat the appearance of ageing with REN Bio-Retinoid Anti-Ageing Concentrate. One of the most effective apothecary products for maintaining a youthful appearance, it makes a dramatic difference to the appearance of imperfections, wrinkles and blemishes.

name: Nuxuriance® Ultra
info: This anti-ageing night cream with Saffron and Bougainvillea Bi-floral Cells helps regenerate and replump the skin and reshape facial contours. Skin appears unlined and luminous. It seems younger: smooth and dense. Its natural radiance is enhanced and features look rested.

name: Extremely Gentle
info: Apply morning and evening using a cotton pad or with the tips of your fingers, using light massaging circular motions. Dry gently without rubbing. Reapply if needed. It is best to finish off by spraying a light mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water before applying the Skin Recovery Cream or Rich Skin Recovery Cream depending on your skin type.

name: Take the Day Off
info: The quicker makeup is off the better, that’s why we love this balm as you can just rub it all over your face, rinse with a wet flannel and it gets rid of everything in one go. Way quicker than scrubbing your face with 5 orange stained makeup wipes.
src: ./images/products/Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm.jpg

name: Truth Juice Daily Cleanser
info: Finally, a juice cleanse you can commit to: Truth Juice Daily Cleanser is a serious multitasker. This everyday vegan cleanser, made with orange fruit water & PHA, removes dirt, oil and longwear eye makeup, and reveals refreshed, energized skin in just one step.

name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser for Normal to Dry Skin
info: An excellent cleanser – and a certified British Vogue beauty team favourite – CeraVe’s Hydrating Cleanser is packed full of ceramides to keep the skin barrier intact, as well as hydrating hyaluronic acid. Plus, it removes make-up in a flash. It’s good for all skin types – even those prone to irritation – as it’s soap-free and doesn’t foam.

name: Toleriane Dermo-Cleanser
info: Aggravated and sensitive skin types in particular will love this La Roche- Posay formula, which is a milk consistency and helps relieve the skin of its discomfort. TLC in a bottle.

name: Cleanance
info: Gentle cleansing gel for oily, blemish prone skin. With clinically proven efficacy, the Gel gently cleanses, removes impurities and make-up whilst reducing excess sebum thanks to innovative patented active ComedoclastinTM. It also contains a high concentration of soothing and softening Avene Thermal Spring Water. Skin is left clear, refreshed, purified and mattified. Suitable for face and body. Biodegradable formula. 84% natural formula.

name: Evercalm™ Gentle Cleansing
info: This gentle facial wash that removes dirt and pollution without harshness.

name: Rosa Centifolia™ Cleanse Reveal Hot Cloth Cleanser
info: A rich daily two step cleanser that gently yet thoroughly purifies, decongests, exfoliates and removes all makeup.
src: ./images/products/Rosa Centifolia™ Cleanse & Reveal Hot Cloth Cleanser.jpg

name: Gentle Face Cleanser Rêve de Miel®
info: This gentle face cleansing and make-up removing gel with honey and sunflower gently cleanses, soothes and removes make-up in a single step. A treat for the senses and beautiful skin.

name: Clearcalm Clarifying Clay Cleanser
info: With a rich Kaolin Clay base, this non-foaming cleanser works to draw out impurities and excess oil, while cleansing Willow Bark Extract helps to minimise pore appearance, while ridding the skin of environmental pollution and daily blemish-causing dirt buildup. Formulated to be non- drying this cleanser actively fights blemishes without harshness or creating redness - making it ideal for teenage or sensitive skin types. Clearcalm Clarifying Clay Cleanser is in Post-Consumer Recycled packaging.

name: Triple Action Cleanser with Thyme
info: Effectively cleanse skin and remove all traces of makeup while balancing the skin's pH with this soothing and hydrating gel. Thyme extracts fight the spread of oil and bacteria, assisting in the reduction of breakouts.

name: Balancing Cleanser
info: A creamy multi-tasking cleanser made with luxurious Vitamin E and Aloe Vera. This gentle non-stripping formula corrects the skin's natural pH balance, preparing skin for optimal ingredient absorption.

name: Evercalm™ Gentle Cleansing Milk
info: This gentle cleansing milk for sensitive skin, designed to make skin feel calm and clean. This hydrating cleanser removes the day's dirt and make- up, bolsters skin's resistance to harmful free radicals and calms the signs of irritation to leave skin looking refreshed and feeling soothed.

name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold with 5% Glycolic Acid
info: The Liquid Gold combines 5% Glycolic Acid with a unique low-pH delivery system to stimulate action at a deeper layer of the skin. This miracle product accelerates the skin's renewal process, dramatically improves brightness and tone, supports collagen production and helps minimise the visible signs of sun damage, ageing and blemishes.

name: Balancing Force™ Oil Control Toner
info: This concentrated pore minimizing vegan toner effectively removes excess oil and refines pores—without stripping skin. It's formulated with Green Fusion ComplexTM, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals —green tea, eucalyptus, algae (kelp) and Irish moss extracts.

name: Glow2OH Dark Spot
info: Seeing dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles and uneven texture? Spent too much time in tanning beds or baking under the sun? It’s time to atone for your skin sins. This potent vegan brightening toner, supercharged with a high concentration of AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids) and witch hazel water, reduces the look of dark spots in as little as 7 days.

name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA
info: Seven skin benefits, one 100% recycled plastic bottle. This vegan cult- status tonic exfoliates, brightens, tightens and hydrates for a smooth, even and energised complexion that's all glow without the irritation.

name: Absolute Eye Complex Serum
info: Absolute Eye Complex is a gently resurfacing, lifting and plumping eye serum designed to combat dark circles and puffiness in the delicate eye contour area. Niacinamide, Pro Vitamin B5, Hibiscus Flower and Cucumber improve the skin's natural barrier, helping to activate skin renewal and deliver deep hydration.

name: Multi-Correction Eye Balm Gel
info: This eye contour gel with botanical caffeine and an anti-oxidant complex containing jasmine flower corrects the main markers that alter the youthful appearance of the eye area (puffiness, dark circles) and helps to protect this delicate area from external aggressions.

name: Ultranourishing Rêve de Miel®
info: A concentrate of beneficial properties, this repairing lip balm combines honey, botanical oils and propolis, a rare and precious bee hive ingredient to immediately soothe, provide intense nourishment and repair your very dry and damaged lips. The melting texture and grapefruit scent make it a must-have to take everywhere you go.

name: Cicaplast Lips
info: Physical and biological barrier treatment to soothe and nourish the skin, preventing future chapping.

name: Transform Plus PHAT Glow Facial
info: We're fan of using exfoliating acids in our skincare and PHAs are gentle acids that work at sloughing off dead skin to reveal the glowy, illuminated skin beneath. This mask really does work wonders, when you'll wash it off your skin will look so much brighter and plump.
src: ./images/products/Ole Henriksen Transform Plus PHAT Glow Facial.jpg

name: Lemonade Smoothing Scrub
info: Inspired by a refreshing glass of lemonade on a hot summer day, this sugar face scrub brings life back to dull, rough skin. This dual-action scrub does double-duty to physically and chemically exfoliate your complexion. High-potency AHAs (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) help loosen and lift dead skin cells, while lemon peel powder and ultra-fine sugar exfoliants gently sweep away rough skin.

name: Cold Plunge Pore Mask
info: Take the plunge for smaller-looking pores, instantly. Deeply purify and diminish pores with an exhilarating chill. Inspired by the “cold plunge” part of a Scandinavian sauna cycle, this cooling clay mask detoxifies, controls surface oil and reduces the look of pores. The innovative formula harnesses the power of alpine willowherb and snow lotus— antioxidant-rich botanicals that have adapted to thrive in extreme cold —to soothe, mattify and refine pores.

name: Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask
info: A potent exfoliating mask formulated to remove dead skin cells to renew the complexion. It helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Beauty Sleep Power Peel
info: Beauty Sleep Power Peel is a dual-purpose resurfacing and restorative formula with 14% Glycolic Acid and 0.5% Retinol that help to boost collagen, stimulate skin renewal and reduce surface imperfections.

name: Micro Super Scrub
info: This dual-action physical and chemical exfoliator combines 12% Glycolic Acid and eco-friendly Bamboo Stem Extract, activating skin renewal for bright, smooth skin. Inspired by professional microdermabrasion, this scrub can be used on both the face and body.

name: Huile Prodigieuse® riche
info: A pioneer in dry oils, Nuxe is now making a dream come true for women with very dry skin searching for comfort. This rich oil nourishes, repairs and gives a satiny feel to your skin, combining intense replenishment with pleasure of use. Skin is intensely nourished and feels softer and more comfortable with no sticky or greasy finish.

name: Reve de Miel® Body Oil Balm
info: This melting body balm with honey and precious botanical oils provides intense nourishing, repairs and soothes sensations of irritation. Its melting texture transforms into a delicate oil when massaged to envelop and comfort the skin, with no sticky effect. Day after day, very dry and sensitive skin feels more supple and comfortable.

name: Shimmering Dry Oil Huile Prodigieuse®
info: The shimmering version of Huile Prodigieuse® nourishes, softens and illuminates your hair and skin thanks to its ultra-fine, pearly mineral particles. The dry oil texture is unique and the fragrance is captivating.

name: Hyaluronic 8 Super Serum
info: A game-changing alternative to dermal fillers, this sophisticated complex of eight hydrating ingredients work in synergy to provide the skin with intense and sustainable hydration. Formulated with multi- weighted forms of Hyaluronic Acid this innovative serum ‘flash’ fills to reduce the appearance of fine lines and enhances overall radiance.

name: Thermal Spring Water Spray for Sensitive Skin
info: A true pharmacy brand - with skincare aimed at treating atopic dermatitis, psoriasis, eczema and burns - Eau Thermale Avène's products are all centred around the brand's own thermal spring, where the water is tested daily to maintain the highest of standards.
src: ./images/products/Thermal Spring Water Spray for Sensitive Skin.jpg

name: Very High Protection B-Protect SPF50+
info: B-Protect SPF 50+ is based on an original 3-in-1 formula: - Anti-UV protection. - Anti-pollution protection. - Beautifying effect. Thanks to its changing texture, the micro-encapsulated pigments are released upon application, and also tint the formula to give the skin an enhanced finish. Complexion is refreshed, illuminated and radiant.
src: ./images/products/Very High Protection B-Protect SPF50+ Sun Cream for Sensitive Skin.jpg

name: Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF50+
info: Ultra-resistant formula specifically developed for sensitive skin. A very high protection, broad spectrum (PPD 46, SPF 50+) comfortable fluid formula that is ultra water, sweat and sand resistant. This non-greasy cream does not leave white marks and does not migrate. Non eye- stinging.

name: Protection Plus Daily Moisturiser SPF 50+
info: Blending antioxidant goodness with highly effective sun protection, Protection Plus Daily SPF 50+ has got you covered. Octocryclene absorbs UVB and short UVA rays while Pomegranate Seed oil assists with skin regeneration and protects against free-radical damage.

name: Age reversal eye complex
info: Advanced, microencapsulated Retinol helps smooth away the signs of skin ageing around the eyes. Microencapsulation technology optimises Retinol potency and absorption to help reduce the appearance of fine lines. Microencapsulated Niacinamide and Ash Tree Bark Extract maintain hydration and reduce visible dark circles. A powerful Age Reversal Firming Complex works synergistically with antioxidant Vitamin C, powerful peptides and botanical extracts to fortify and smooth skin. This product contains retinol,  a form of Vitamin A. if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, please consult a physician prior to use. Not recommended for use within 72 hours of waxing or exfoliation. Avoid the eye are. Temporary redness, flakiness, peeling and sensitivity may occur. Theses reactions are normal and will fade over time. Use sunscreen during the day. If irritation persists, discontinue use and seek advice from a professional skin therapist.

name: Biolumin-c serum
info: High-performance serum enhances skin’s natural defence system to brighten, firm and help dramatically reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Advanced bio-technology and an ultra-stable Vitamin C complex work synergystically to enhance bioavailability of Vitamin C to fight oxidative stress and the appearance of skin ageing before it starts. Optimised delivery system combined with a peptide and AHA renews for brighter, firmer, more radiant skin.

name: Daily microfoliant
info: Achieve brighter, smoother skin every day with this iconic exfoliating powder. Rice-based powder activates upon contact with water, releasing Papain, Salicylic Acid and Rice Enzymes to polish skin to perfection. A Skin Brightening Complex of Phytic Acid from Rice Bran, White Tea and Licorice helps balance uneven skin tone while a super-soothing blend of Colloidal Oatmeal and Allantoin helps calm skin. Gentle enough for daily use.

name: Dynamic skin recovery spf50
info: Broad Spectrum moisturiser helps combat the appearance of skin ageing. Help minimise the appearance of skin ageing with this medium-weight, emollient daily moisturiser with Broad Spectrum SPF50. Antioxidant White Tea, rich in polyphenols, and a unique polypeptide help improve the appearance of photoaged skin. Active sunscreens protect against UVA and UVB rays. Blends smoothly over skin for a perfect finish.

name: Intensive moisture balance
info: Ultra-nourishing moisturiser restores lipid balance to dry, depleted skin for optimal barrier performance. BioReplenish Complex delivers a proven combination of key barrier lipids to help enhance the skin's natural resilience and support barrier recovery. A prebiotic Chlorella Algae complex helps rebalance the skin's natural microbiome for healthy-looking skin. Hyaluronic Acid, combined with Echinacea, Centella Asiatica and Aloe Vera, locks in hydration to help enhance the skin's moisture content and reduce the appearance of fine lines.

name: Precleanse
info: Deep-cleansing oil melts make-up and impurities from skin. Achieve ultra clean and healthy-looking skin with the Double Cleanse regimen that begins with PreCleanse. Thoroughly melt away layers of excess sebum (oil), sunscreen, waterproof make-up, environmental pollutants and residual products that build up on skin throughout the day. Ideal even for oily skin conditions.

name: Skin Smoothing Cream
info: Next-generation moisturiser with Active HydraMesh Technology™ infuses skin with 48 hours of continuous hydration and helps protect against environmental stress. This best-selling moisturiser features a state-of-the-art complex that works on a molecular level to help reduce Trans-Epidermal Water Loss (TEWL) and infuse skin with 48 hours of vital moisture. This advanced technology also helps shield skin’s natural microbiome from environmental stress. A dynamic Hyaluronic Acid Complex with Mallow, Cucumber and Arnica distributes hydration throughout the skin, helping to lock in moisture for lasting hydration. Also formulated with naturally-antioxidant Grape Seed Extract, Vitamin C and Vitamin E.

name: Special cleansing gel
info: Soap-free, foaming gel cleanses all skin conditions. Refreshing lather thoroughly removes impurities, without disturbing the skin’s natural moisture balance. This iconic cleanser, which contains naturally-foaming Quillaja Saponaria, gently rinses away toxins and debris to leave skin feeling smooth and clean. Lightweight and mild enough to use every day, it also features calming Balm Mint and Lavender extracts to soothe the skin.

name: Super Rich Repair
info: Deeply nourishing skin treatment cream for chronically dry, dehydrated skin. Heavyweight cream helps replenish skin’s natural moisture levels to defend against environmental assaults. Powerful peptides and an acid-free smoothing complex support skin resilience and tone. Shea Butter and Oil of Evening Primrose help replenish and hydrate, while antioxidants help defend against free radical damage. Store at room temperature.

name: Ultracalming cleanser
info: Gentle cleansing gel/cream for reactive skin. This pH-balanced, non-foaming cleanser helps calm and cool reactive, sensitised or overprocessed skin. Delicately fortifies skin’s protective barrier without leaving an irritating residue, and easily rinses away or wipes off, making it ideal for sensitive skin.

name: Body Illuminating Bronzing Mousse (Natural rose)
info: Amanda Harrington’s line-up of tanning products is firmly rooted in the early years of her career, when she started as a make-up and body artist, sculpting and transforming bodies by painting and contouring on sets and editorial shoots. Today, she is one of the beauty industry’s most esteemed sunless tanning experts, with one of her award-winning products being the Illuminating Bronzing Body Mousse. Infused with hyaluronic acid, aloe vera and CQ10, it hydrates, firms and lifts, while harnessing green tea extract to revive tired-looking skin.
how: Use the Amanda Harrington Body Mousse as part of the brand's three-step sun-free self-tanning program. After applying the Body Primer (Perfect Body Ultimate Gradual Tan - available on our platform), smooth the mousse on to the entire body, working in sections. Finally, blend with a body brush and allow to dry for 10 minutes before dressing.
src: ./images/products/Body Illuminating Bronzing Mousse by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Big Body Brush
info: An essential tool for all the lovers of sun-kissed skin, this Amanda Harrington brush presents the perfect finishing touch to your self-tanning routine. Thanks to the super-soft bristles, it works effortlessly with the natural curves of the body, brushing and buffing your tan into the skin so it lasts longer and fades equally and beautifully.

name: Face Illuminating Bronzing Mist (Natural rose)
info: Sunless tanning has never been more effortless in the world of Amanda Harrington, the esteemed sunless tanning expert that’s caught the attention of A-listers and Hollywood’s elite. Take the Illuminating Bronzing Face Mist as an example; boasting a lightweight, super-blendable liquid formula that dispenses from an ultra-fine atomiser, it allows for fool-proof blending, while harnessing collagen and CQ10 to firm and deliver anti-ageing benefits. The Rose shade has been designed for people with fair skin, Honey is more suitable for those with warm medium skin and Olive is ideal for darker skin tones.
src: ./images/products/Face Illuminating Bronzing Mist by Amanda Harrington.jpg

info: Sunless tanning has never been more effortless in the world of Amanda Harrington, the esteemed sunless tanning expert that’s caught the attention of A-listers and Hollywood’s elite. src: ./images/products/Face Illuminating Bronzing Mist by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: The Face Lifter
info: We prepour basebefore make-up and our hair before styling, so why not prep your skin before tanning? This is the motto for Amanda Harrington, anyway, a brand renowned for its modern, personalised approach to achieving a sunless glow. The third step to your routine, The Face Lifter is a soft angled brush that’s essential for a long-lasting, streak-free tan, and is the perfect size for creating an all-over bronzed visage, as well as adding extra definition and contour.

name: New Skin Advanced Glycolic Facial Pads
info: Exfoliate, hydrate and prolong a sunless tan with the Amanda Harrington New Skin Face - Advanced Glycolic Facial Pad, a smoothing treatment from the brand's skincare collection. Enriched with a brightening and plumping cream, these facial pads work to refine the complexion without comprising the appearance of a golden glow. The moisture-rich formula contains a bio-energy complex to help support the skin's natural collagen, while Pollustop works to provide a veil of protection against free-radical damage.
how: To use an Amanda Harrington New Skin Face - Advanced Glycolic Facial Pad, simply wipe it over the face and neck area. These pads can be used between two to three times each week before starting the three-step tanning method.
src: ./images/products/New Skin Advanced Glycolic Facial Pads by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Perfect Body Ultimate Gradual Tan
info: Build an illuminated yet subtle glow to the body with the Amanda Harrington Perfect Body Ultimate Gradual Tan, a versatile tanning primer that works to create a hydrated look and extend an existing tan. This primer uses hyaluronic acid and collagen to add plumpness to the skin while simultaneously working to enhance its elasticity. Enriched with aloe vera and a luxurious blend of almond oil and shea butter, this primer helps hydrate the skin, replenishing its moisture and leaving it soft to the touch. The Ultimate Gradual Tan can be used either alone to build up a natural-looking tan, or as the first step of Amada Harrington’s Definitive 3 Step Tanning Method, acting as the catalyst for a long-lasting, sun-kissed glow.
src: ./images/products/Perfect Body Ultimate Gradual Tan by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Perfect Face Ultimate Gradual Tan
info: Achieve the perfect age-defying glow with Amanda Harrington Perfect Face Ultimate Gradual Tan, a primer that works to boost skin health and radiance while extending the longevity of a sunless tan. Formulated with intelligent actives and gentle tanning agents, it helps to gradually build a sun-kissed complexion. Containing hyaluronic acid, collagen, low levels of DHA and Pollustop®, this tanning primer helps to improve firmness, plumpness and elasticity while offering a degree of protection from free radicals and environmental damage. In addition, shea butter, avocado oil and aloe leaf juice help to nourish and hydrate the complexion. Amanda Harrington Perfect Face Ultimate Gradual Tan can be used alone or as part of a three-step tanning method as a soothing base for further products.
src: ./images/products/Perfect Face Ultimate Gradual Tan by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Ultimate Body Miracle Moisture Cream
info: Amanda Harrington knows that a beautiful tan begins with a perfectly moisturised body, which is why the Ultimate Body Miracle Moisture Cream is infused with hydrating properties to ensure your glow remains smooth, even and natural-looking.Boosted with hyaluronic acid to maintain vital moisture levels, it rejuvenates and plumps tired-looking skin by harnessing 3D ultra-filling spheres. The result is a lifted, tightened and firmer appearance.
src: ./images/products/Ultimate Body Miracle Moisture Cream by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Ultimate Face Miracle Moisture Cream
info: To Amanda Harrington, the perfect sunless tan starts with youthful hydration, and it’s because of this that the Ultimate Face Miracle Moisture Cream is infused with everything you need to create an age-defying, radiant visage. How it achieves this is through its nutrient rich formula; while multi-active neodermyl triggers the skin to produce collagen and elastin, reducing the appearance of wrinkles, pollustop protects from pollution while alsoimproving texture.
src: ./images/products/Ultimate Face Miracle Moisture Cream by Amanda Harrington.jpg

name: Clarifying scalp exfoliant
info: Clarifying Scalp Exfoliant gently exfoliates and cleanses, reducing the appearance of a flaky, itchy, dry scalp. Optimum levels of Lactic Acid, a naturally occurring Alpha Hydroxy Acid, encourage the scalp's natural exfoliation process, gently removing dead skin cells. Together with the unique LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex, this non-abrasive exfoliating scrub leaves the scalp feeling conditioned, whilst respecting its natural pH balance. This fragrance-free scrub delivers instant relief and comfort to the scalp, progressively refining and improving its texture and condition. The scalp is left feeling more comfortable, instantly relieved, conditioned and healthier-looking. Suitable for all hair types.

name: Clarifying Intensive Lip Treatment
info: AMELIORATE Intensive Lip Treatment progressively hydrates, refines and improves lip texture, providing instant comfort and long‐term relief to very dry, chapped lips. Optimum levels of active ingredients, together with a blend of Ceramide‐like Amino Acids, Oat Lipids and the unique LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex replenish hydration levels, enhance the skin’s protective moisture barrier, improving elasticity and smoothness. This non‐greasy, easily absorbed lip cream reduces the appearance of dry, red lips and helps build a protective shield against dehydration around the delicate lip area. Lips are left feeling softer, smoother and healthier‐looking.

name: Clarifying Shampoo
info: Clarifying Shampoo gently cleanses, protects and replenishes natural moisture in the hair and relieves a flaky, itchy, dry scalp. Prebiotics, Lactitol and Xylitol, combined with the unique LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex soothe and gently clear up flakes on a dry scalp whilst conditioning actives help maintain hair's volume and shine. This mild pH balanced shampoo is proven to cleanse and nourish hair. Used regularly, it will help to replenish and rebalance the scalp's natural protective barrier. The scalp is left feeling more comfortable, with softer, smoother, healthier-looking hair. Suitable for all hair types.

name: BEAR Mini pink
info: FOREO’S miniature-sized BEAR Microcurrent Facial Toning Device provides visible skin-firming benefits. The at-home facial device helps to provide a sculpting and toning effect, utilising 5 intensities of microcurrent technology, along with T-Sonic pulsations to help lift, tone, and re-contour age-sensitive areas such as the jawline, cheeks, neck and forehead. Providing precise, targeted treatment, the non-invasive device helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, promoting a smother, firmer and more youthful-looking appearance. A revolutionary Anti-Shock System allows the BEAR to measure your skin’s resistance to electricity, adjusting the microcurrents within your chosen intensity to ensure maximum safety and comfort at every level. FOREO’s conductive serum allows the device to glide over the skin, ensuring even and comfortable treatment. Suitable for all skin types and ages, the device delivers visible, long-lasting results with continued use. Discover a firmed, toned and sculpted complexion with this innovative device, for a salon-quality facial from the comfort of your own home. Ideal for those wanting to start early with anti-ageing treatments Pre-programmed routines on the FOREO For You App.

name: ESPADA Blue Light Acne Treatment
info: Foreo's electronic 'ESPADA' device recreates the same LED treatment you'd get at a dermatologist, so you can treat acne and blackheads from home. The laser-focused blue light targets blemish-causing bacteria and helps cleanse blocked pores, while the vibrating T-Sonic™ pulsations work to speed skin renewal and reveal a clearer complexion in less time. It's lightweight enough to pop it in your gym bag or carry-on, too.

name: GloPRO® Microneedling Regeneration Tool
info: GloPRO's patented technology helps stimulate skin's natural healing response to induce micro-rejuvenation deep within the skin for a visibly firmer, smoother and younger-looking appearance. As MicroTips pass over the skin cells respond immediately to the imperceptible microchannels created, prompting a rejuvenating process that helps restore volume from the inside out.Red LED light function and VibroTactile Stimulation work synergistically to help enhance regenerative skin benefits. Used alone or as a companion to your favourite serums and creams, this youth-promoting tool helps make the absorption of key anti-ageing ingredients more efficient, while enhancing the overall performance of your favourite skincare.

name: Light-Therapy Golden Facial Treatment
info: MZ Skin was created by Dr. Maryam Zamani in her mission to help women 'achieve healthy, glowing, youthful skin'. A pioneer in high-performance skincare, the brand continues to revolutionise at-home beauty rituals with treatments like the Light-Therapy Golden Facial LED Device. The innovative mask works to rejuvenate the skin with a multicoloured series of light therapy, helping with inflammation, breakouts and reducing hyper- pigmentation, among other problems.

name: LUNA 3 Plus for Normal Skin
info: Harness the power of a pampering spa treatment from the comfort of your own home with Foreo’s Luna 3. Specifically designed for normal skin, this cleansing and toning gadget utilises eight thermal touchpoints and calming T-Sonic pulsations to banish dirt and lock in moisture. Connect it to the skincare specialist’s tailor-made app to customise your self-care routine as your skin requires before enjoying your deepest yet gentlest cleanse yet.

name: LUNA Mini 2
info: Designed around your life, the compact Foreo LUNA Mini 2 Facial Cleansing Brush is a skincare must-have for a clean and clear complexion. With just one minute of cleansing, morning and evening, it helps to rid skin of impurities and unclog pores for a brighter, smoother and healthier complexion. Dry, sensitive and oily skin types can enjoy this revolutionary mechanical cleansing brush with varying brush surfaces. Completely waterproof, it is perfect for travel, bath and shower use. With a three-zone face brush, eight speed settings and each full charge lasting up to 300 uses, it is at the forefront of electronic skincare innovation, while still boasting a compact and convenient body.

name: Mini Facial Toning Device
info: All the benefits of a microcurrent treatment in a petite, portable and powerful device. The mini delivers unparalleled professional results and is easy to use in as little as 5 minutes per day. Shown to improve facial contour, facial tone, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Mini UFO 2
info: Now available in a slim, portable design, the Foreo's revolutionary maskdeviceis even easier to use with the Mini UFO 2. Offering a decadent facial in seconds, it combines advanced thermo-therapy, LED light therapy and dermal technologies with exclusive Korean mask formulas to prep the skin for treatment by loosening sebum and relaxing facial muscles.
src: ./images/products/Mini UFO 2 Power Mask and Light Therapy Device mint.jpg

name: NuFACE FIX
info: Transform the look of your skin with the NuFACE FIX Line Smoothing Device, a pen-sized skincare tool that provides gentle bursts of NuFACE® microcurrent energy to help reduce the look of and prevent fine lines and wrinkles. Instantly targeting signs of ageing around the eyes, lips and forehead in just three minutes, the skin-firming device delivers a smoothing and tightening effect to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Pair with the NuFACE FIX™ Line Smoothing Serum; the first ionic Microcurrent Skincare™ formula, supercharged with active beauty ingredients to help smoothen, tighten and brighten the look of skin. Suitable for all skin types.

name: NuFACE The Petite Facial Kit
info: You get the best of both worlds with this powerful microcurrent set, which delivers instant and cumulative anti-ageing results. Treat your face and neck in just 5 minutes with the NuFACE Mini Facial Toner. Once done, supercharge your treatment with the NuFACE FIX, which has been designed to instantly plump and smooth fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes, lips and forehead. Both devices harness gentle microcurrent technology, which works below the skin’s surface to stimulate the collagen and elastin production. When used alongside the specially formulated microcurrent skincare, your results will be enhanced too.

name: Rose Quartz Roller
info: Enjoy the calming qualities and skincare benefits of Beautybio's Rose Quartz Roller. Crafted from sustainably harvested Brazilian rose quartz, the dual-ended roller is ideal for maximising and sealing in the benefits of serums and moisturisers. Enjoy an at-home salon-level experience by chilling in the refrigerator for instant cooling and de-puffing effect, while also promoting lymphatic drainage and reducing the appearance of pores.

name: Spectralite Faceware Pro
info: Inspired by Dr. Gross’s professional in-office lasers, the SpectraLite FaceWare Pro is a medical grade mask that harnesses a full spectrum of therapeutic red and blue light. Working to clear acne and smooth wrinkles with every 3-minute application, it is fitted with an adjustable head strap to stay firmly in place while it works its magic.

name: Color Minded
info: Bumble and bumble Color Minded Conditioner is a moisture whip so rich, it also moonlights as a deep conditioning masque. Designed to seal in shine and keep tones true, Bumble and bumble Color Minded Conditioner prevents colour fade with the highest concentration of Colour Preserving Complex. It prolongs vibrancy and brilliance whilst being lightweight yet deep conditioning.
how: Use after cleansing with Bumble and bumble Color Minded Shampoo (available in our platform). Smooth through hair and leave for a minute or two. For a deeper weekly treatment, use as a masque and leave in for up to 10 minutes before rinsing.

name: Color Minded
info: Protect hair colour whilst revealing ultimate shine and vibrancy with Bumble and bumble Color Minded Sulfate Free Shampoo. Bumble and bumble Color Minded Sulfate Free Shampoo is an ultra-mild cleanser designed to prevent fading, protect colour integrity and eliminate colour wash out. The unique Colour Preserving Complex seals in shine and prolongs lustre and brilliance.
how: Use every time you shampoo to help preserve hair colour. Wet hair, lather and rinse thoroughly. To seal colour and add shine, follow with Bumble and bumble Color Minded Conditioner.

name: Gentle Shampoo
info: This cleanser is a must for your dry, coloured, permed or overstyled hair! Bumble and bumble Gentle Shampoo gently cleanses your hair, while effectively moisturising and adding shine. Your chemically treated hair will love the luxurious feel and fragrance of this ultra mild shampoo. It contains Avocado oil that adds moisture, while glycerine softens your hair and nettle extract act as a natural tonic.
how: Apply Bumble and bumble Gentle Shampoo on your wet hair. Lather very small amount of it in the palms of your hands. Massage through. Rinse thoroughly. You don't need to repeat the shampooing

name: Pret a Powder Tres Invisible
info: Achieve effortless style instantly with Bumble and bumble Pret a Powder Tres Invisible, a lightweight dry shampoo for dry and damaged hair types. Powered by Hibiscus Extract, the formula absorbs excess oil from roots whilst nourishing dry ends, leaving hair healthy and hydrated, while UV filters help to protect against the damage caused by the sun. Leaving behind a delicate uplifting scent without any trace of white residue, the style extender creates locks that are fresh, full and healthy between washes. Suitable for dry, damaged and colour-treated hair.
src: ./images/products/Bumble and bumble Pret a Powder Tres Invisible 150ml.jpg

name: Pret a Powder Tres Invisible Nourishing
info: Achieve effortless style instantly with Bumble and bumble Pret a Powder Tres Invisible Nourishing, a lightweight dry shampoo for dry and damaged hair types. Powered by Hibiscus Extract, the formula absorbs excess oil from roots whilst nourishing dry ends, leaving hair healthy and hydrated, while UV filters help to protect against the damage caused by the sun. Leaving behind a delicate uplifting scent without any trace of white residue, the style extender creates locks that are fresh, full and healthy between washes. Suitable for dry, damaged and colour-treated hair.

name: Surf Spray
info: Surfs up with this salt infused styling spray that will rekindle summer. With that wild, wind styled texture you get after an ocean swim Bumble and bumble Surf Spray is the greatest ocean alternative. Add volume, texture and a salty, sun dried, wind styled feel with Bumble and bumble Surf Spray. Bumble and bumble have replicated the ocean feel and somehow even improved it, including seaweed and kelp extracts to enhance moisture and manageability. This great product can be used by anyone from wavy types to landlocked surfers adding body to fine hair, waves to thick and fantastic texture to your hair.
how: Spray evenly onto your damp or dry hair. Style and let dry or use a diffuser. Remember the less you touch it, the longer it will hold.

name: Full Potential
info: Nourish your hair with the Bumble and bumble Full Potential Conditioner. An innovative, kind-to-hair formula replenishes your tresses, with the help of energising Creatine maintaining a glossy, healthy-looking appearance. Potent Menthol invigorates the senses, offering a cooling, tingling sensation that is destined to prepare you for the day ahead. The addition of UV absorbers creates a protective barrier against harsh external aggressors and UV damage, that could potentially cause breakage or split ends. This allows the conditioner to be highly rejuvenating and destined to promote the illusion of stronger tresses. Treat your hair to some well-deserved TLC and enviable, full-bodied tresses in minutes. Free from parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, and formaldehyde. Cruelty free.
src: ./images/products/Full Potential Conditioner by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Full Potential
info: Create fuller, stronger locks with the Bumble and bumble Full Potential Shampoo. This shampoo helps to fortify strands while enhancing a strong and supple appearance. Infused with an expert Hair Preserve Blend™, the formula boasts exfoliating agents that gently lift away dirt, grime and excess product build-up that can clog the pores on the scalp. This helps lay down an optimal foundation for the rise of voluminous, resilient strands. Creatine lends a boosted and rejuvenated finish. Menthol charges scalps with a cool, tingling sensation to ensure a truly invigorating experience. Added UV Absorbers equip the hair with protective qualities, helping to defend against UV damage for healthy-looking tresses that are less prone to breakages when used as part of the brand’s Full Potential Regime . This Bumble and bumble shampoo foams into a rich, creamy lather, performing a thorough cleanse from root to tip. Hair is left soft, shiny and strong, powered by volume.
src: ./images/products/Full Potential Shampoo by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Hairdresser's Invisible Oil
info: Infused with an expert blend of six feather-light oils, Bumble and bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Primer is a lightweight, pre-styling mist that has been specially formulated for the needs of dry, coarse or brittle hair. esigned to soften and detangle your hair whilst eliminating frizz, this multi-tasking primer will also protect against breakage, heat styling and UV damage to keep your tresses feeling strong and healthy. With a sweet, fruity scent that will linger in your hair, the primer won't weigh your locks down.
how: Mist onto damp hair. Comb through. Style as desired
src: ./images/products/Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Conditioner by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Super Rich
info: La crème de la comb, this luxurious detangler softens your unmanageable curly, coarse or chemically treated hair. Bumble & Bumble Super Rich Conditioner also restores the lustre and spring to your hair. This nutritious conditioner contains several conditioning agents that ease wet combing, increasing elasticity and shine. Super Rich Conditioner effectively fights against moisture loss and static creation.
how: Apply Bumble & Bumble Super Rich Conditioner to your clean, wet hair. Comb or work through your hair. Rinse thoroughly
src: ./images/products/Super Rich Conditioner 250ml by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Thickening Volume
info: Improve the appearance of limp and lifeless locks with Bumble and Bumble Thickening Conditioner, a nourishing and texturising conditioner enriched with vitamin E, fruit extract and pro-vitamin B5. This conditioner boasts a bodybuilding formula, which helps fine hair appear livelier and more lustrous. Taming flyaways and sealing split ends, it works to improve the look and feel of locks, making tresses glossier and more manageable. The presence of barbadensis leaf and hydrolysed wheat protein soothes and smooths the hair without weighing it down. Bumble and Bumble Thickening Conditioner helps protect the hair against environmental damage. It is perfect for all hair types and lengths, including chemically treated and coloured hair. All Bumble and Bumble products are cruelty-free and formulated without parabens, phthalates and mineral oils.
src: ./images/products/Thickening Volume Conditioner by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Thickening Volume
info: If you crave for the glamour of fuller, sexier, retro style look no further. Bumble and bumble Thickening Shampoo is the ultimate solution for your fine hair as it makes it look and feel full of body. This lightweight shampoo will give your fine, struggling hair a lift and more oomph. Thickening Shampoo also seals your split ends and smoothes flyaways, yet it won't add weight to your delicate head. So why not start building body in the shower with this fortifying shampoo'
src: ./images/products/Thickening Volume Shampoo by Bumble and Bumble.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Glow Pad Intense Glow
info: See fast self-tanning results with Dr Dennis Gross AB Glow Pad Intense Glow, an all-in-one tanning solution with smooth, streak-free and natural looking results. This self-tanning solution has been carefully formulated with alpha and beta hydroxy acids, and is enriched with skin supporting vitamins. These sophisticated exfoliating self-tan pads are the simple way to get a healthy natural glow, fast. With no need for time-consuming preparation, the glow pads provide a natural colour in just three hours. Simply apply the tanning pad over clean, dry skin using a circular motion and wait for tan to develop. For a more intense colour repeat the process. The key benefits: All-in-one self-tanning solution, Dermatologist developed, Contains alpha and beta hydroxy acids to exfoliate and combat the signs of ageing, Natural, streak-free results in three hours.
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Glow Pad Intense Glow by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Peel Extra Strength Formula
info: Reduce the appearance of wrinkles and enlarged pores with Dr Dennis Gross Extra Strength Alpha Beta Face Peel (30 Application Packettes). Formulated with a patented two-step system that combines Alpha and Beta® Hydroxy Acids and new anti-aging boosters, it smoothes and enriches your skin to leave it looking youthful and radiant. Blemishes, dark spots, enlarged pores, redness and signs of ageing will be dramatically reduced, so your skin looks clearer and more even-toned. Suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive of complexions, this easy-to-use peel is perfect for achieving professional quality results in the comfort of your own home.
how: Apply each pre-soaked towelette to your face, neck and décolleté. Massage in circular motions
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Peel Extra Strength Formula by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Blemish Solutions Sulfur Mask
info: Clear your complexion with the Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Skincare DRx Blemish Solutions Clarifying Mask. A prominent dermatologist and dermatologic surgeon, Dr Dennis developed his skincare products in line with the concerns of his patients. Delivering real results, the formulas are fuelled by innovative ingredients. Hardworking, this acne-fighting mask is of clinical strength, using a blend of potent ingredients to clarify the complexion. Infused with Colloidal Sulfur and Bentonite Clay, the formula detoxifies the skin’s surface to remove dirt, impurities, dead cells and pimple-causing bacteria from the pores. Also enriched with exfoliating Kaolin Clay, the mask helps to balance the skin’s oil levels, combatting excess sebum production to mattify the surface. Despite its purifying powers, the mask is non-drying. Packed with skin-friendly ingredients, the mask leaves the visage moisturised and nourished, rather than dry or tight. What’s more, Phenylethyl Resorcinol and Zinc Oxide work in harmony to reduce any redness and cool any irritation, with an anti-inflammatory effect that leaves skin with a more even tone and texture. Finally, Aloe Vera Extract helps to heal and repair the skin, reducing the appearance of acne scars and imperfection. Multi-talented, the mask can be used as a spot treatment or an overnight mask, working to reveal more balanced complexion.
src: ./images/products/Blemish Solutions Sulfur Mask by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Refining Serum
info: The Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum from Dr. Dennis Gross is made up of an impressive cocktail of AHA and BHA acids that, alongside the addition of willow bark extract, work to unclog pores and accelerate cell turnover. The result? Clear, smooth skin with fewer breakouts and blackheads.
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Cleansing Gel
info: An essential addition to your nighttime routine, the Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Cleansing Gel from Dr. Dennis Gross exfoliates and tones your skin using a coveted combination of hydroxy acids. Removing even the slightest trace of dirt, oil and make-up, this non-stripping product reveals refreshed, hydrated skin after each use.
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Cleansing Gel by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel
info: Target and treat the common signs of ageing with Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Skincare Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel, a pack of 5 skin peels that use the original, iconic formula. The two-step treatment uses a combination of five potent Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids to help even the skin tone and texture, reduce the appearance of wrinkles and minimise enlarged pores. Step 1 uses a gentle exfoliating action to resurface the complexion, leaving it smooth and radiant, while Step 2 restores intense hydration and nourishment for a refreshed, rebalanced appearance. Resveratrol uses antioxidant benefits to create a protective veil over the skin, defending against damage caused by free radicals and other environmental aggressors. Expect a strengthened, revitalised and visibly glowing complexion. Suitable for all skin types. Free from parabens and phthalates. Vegan and cruelty-free.
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Alpha Beta Ultra Gentle Daily Peel
info: Enhance your skin's natural radiance with Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Ultra Gentle Peel, a two-step treatment that helps combat three common signs of ageing: uneven skin tone, fine lines and wrinkles, and enlarged pores. Suitable for sensitive and fragile skin, the peel utilises gentle acids and calming botanicals to help refine and nourish the complexion. Step one gently exfoliates and smoothens skin; its trio of acids perform a delicate peeling action to help slough away dead skin cells, improve skin texture and unclog pores. Step two performs a firming and lifting effect; its synergy of anti-ageing actives and soothing Colloidal Oatmeal expertly correct, nourish and hydrate the skin. Fine lines are wrinkles appear reduced and enlarged pores more refined. Ideal for sensitive and fragile skin types. Free from parabens. Cruelty free. Vegan.
src: ./images/products/Alpha Beta Ultra Gentle Daily Peel by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: C + Collagen Brighten + Firm Eye Cream
info: Revive the look of tired, ageing eyes with Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Skincare C+Collagen Brighten and Firm Eye Cream, an energising eye treatment that addresses signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye contour. Combining a proprietary Vitamin C Complex with Collagen Amino Acids and a unique Energy Complex, the silk, anti-ageing cream melts effortlessly into skin, delivering smoothing and brightening properties to promote radiant and youthful-looking results. Tackling the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, it contains Ceramides to strengthen and firm the look of skin, whilst peptides encourage collagen production for smoother, visibly younger-looking eyes. It also utilises light reflectors to blur imperfections and brighten dark circles. After use, eyes appear radiant, revived and energised.
src: ./images/products/C + Collagen Brighten + Firm Eye Cream by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: C + Collagen Deep Cream
info: Improve the look of dry, ageing skin with Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Skincare C+Collagen Deep Cream, a luxurious moisturiser that works to hydrate, smoothen and brighten the complexion. Promoting supple skin with a healthy, dewy glow, the cream combines the brand's proprietary 3-O C Vitamin C Technology with Collagen, Amino Acids and an Energy Complex to help enhance radiance and diminish the appearance of dark spots and wrinkles. Infused with a concentration of nourishing oils extracted from Camellia Japonica Seed, Sunflower Seed, and Rice Bran to provide skin with moisture and help reduce water loss. Delivering long-lasting hydration, the vitamin-packed formula will leave dry, ageing skin looking plumped, energised and bright.
src: ./images/products/C + Collagen Deep Cream by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Dark Spot Sun Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Sunscreen
info: A sunscreen that also ‘un-does’ signs of damage? Dr. Dennis Gross’s Dark Spot Sun Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 might just be the answer to your skin care prayers. Combining high factor protection from the DNA-damaging effects of UVA and UVB rays, this anti-ageing filter simultaneously brightens existing dark spots to restore uniformity of tone. Enriched with hydrating, skin conditioning ingredients, the lightweight, non-chalky lotion applies without a trace – creating an invisible barrier between complexion and the elements – while three forms of vitamin C and vitamin E work alongside a breakthrough, melatonin complex to exhibit a tangible anti-ageing effect. Skin-nourishing ceramides, hyaluronic acid and evening primrose oil combine to enhance elasticity and bolster skin’s resilience, while the long-lasting physical sun filters provide the highest, FDA-approved level of sun protection available.
src: ./images/products/Dark Spot Sun Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Sunscreen by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: C+ Collagen Brighten Firm Vitamin C Serum
info: Recharge tired complexions with Dr Dennis Gross C + Collagen Brighten and Firm Serum, intensive skincare for dull, age-damaged skin. This gel serum offers powerful first aid for flagging faces, delivering a boost of vitamin C and collagen amino acids that help support the skin’s own regeneration and repair functions. Formulated in conjunction with certified dermatologist Dr Dennis Gross, this potent serum is designed to deliver a boost to skin cells, helping to boost the natural production of collagen for firmer, tighter skin and working to strengthen skin’s natural defences against the elements. Use once daily on the face and neck before moisturising for best results.
src: ./images/products/C+ Collagen Brighten & Firm Vitamin C Serum by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Ferulic Retinol Anti Aging Moisturiser
info: Restore youthful skin with Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Skincare Ferulic and Retinol Anti-Ageing Moisturiser, a rich and velvety cream that revitalises the complexion. Powered by a potent cocktail of Retinol, Ferulic Acid and the brand’s own ECG Complex™, the luxurious formula envelops skin in a veil of intense and lasting hydration to smooth rough texture and plump out fine lines and wrinkles. Helping to strengthen the natural moisture barrier and firm any sagging skin, the lightweight yet powerful moisturiser works to reveal a brighter, tighter and younger-looking complexion.
src: ./images/products/Ferulic + Retinol Anti Aging Moisturiser by Dr Dennis Gross.jpg

name: Instant Radiance Sun Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF40
info: Achieve a flawless-looking complexion while preventing sun damage with Dr Dennis Gross Instant Radiance Sun Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 40, a tinted moisturiser and face SPF that protects and defends the skin against free radicals. The rich, replenishing texture feels soothing and conditioning on application, and the age-defying benefits are both instant and cumulative – so not only do eyes look ‘alive’ in mere moments, but with regular use, you’ll soon see an improvement in the texture, smoothness and resilience of the fragile, orbital area.

Coconut water and avocado oil nourish and rehydrate, leaving your whole body instantly smoother, softer, and nurtured.
