name: D-Bronzi Antipollution Drops
info: D-Bronzi’s just-got-back-from somewhere-sunny glow flatters every complexion. It’s an easy way to get a bronzy glow without the long-term consequences.

name: Lala Retro Whipped Cream
info: This multifaceted rescue cream, infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex, provides replenishing barrier support by reinforcing skin’s acid mantle and defending against the effects of everyday stressors. Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer easily soaks in to release intense hydration. In addition, antioxidant-rich fermented green tea helps combat signs of aging. Loaded with omega acids, Lala helps skin retain long-lasting moisture, forming a protective layer that allows skin to function at its optimal level.
src: ./images/products/Lala Retro Whipped Cream by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Protini Polypeptide Cream
info: Protini’s proprietary formula restores younger, revived-looking skin, almost from the first application. Lines, wrinkles, and signs of sun damage appear reduced, and skin feels strengthened and moisturized.

name: Shaba Complex Eye Serum
info: The Shaba Complex™ Eye Serum contains potent doses of black tea ferment and copper peptides that work together to support a smoother, younger appearance around the eyes, helping to slow down the signs of aging before they appear. With a unique combination of edelweiss stem cells and niacinamide, Shaba Complex™ helps diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The powerful antioxidants in Co-Q10 help prevent premature signs of aging from environmental aggressors, while also helping to fade age spots.
src: ./images/products/Shaba Complex Eye Serum by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Sili Body Lotion
info: With a blend of nourishing plant oils and butters, squalane, strengthening amino acids, a reparative 5-ceramide blend and barrier-supportive sodium PCA, Sili™ locks in hydration while restoring the moisture you’ve lost due to damaging environmental stressors.

name: Slaai Makeup Melting Butter Cleanser
info: Formulated with antioxidant-rich fruit extracts and oils to help soothe, plus a nourishing African oil blend of marula, baobob, kalahari melon, mongongo and ximenia, Slaai™ Makeup-Melting Butter Cleanser cleanses and moisturizes without any irritants or sensitizers.
src: ./images/products/Slaai Makeup Melting Butter Cleanser by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Night Serum
info: Formulated with the dream team of glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids and blended with raspberry extract and horse chestnut, T.L.C. Framboos™ curbs excess oiliness as it reveals greater clarity and luminosity. It also enhances the performance of other products by clearing the way for maximum absorption. T.L.C. Framboos™ sinks in easily and delivers an effective level of chemical exfoliation without harsh side effects, like dryness or sensitization. Go from a drab complexion to an absolutely luminous one, practically overnight.
src: ./images/products/T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Night Serum by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub
info: Using a blend of six antioxidant- and fatty-acid-rich plant oils (including marula, mongongo, baobab and maracuja) and a quick-absorbing multi-amino-acid blend,  T.L.C. Happi Scalp™ Scrub keeps the scalp nourished, flake-free, and balanced.
src: ./images/products/T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF30
info: Umbra Sheer™ is a daily sunscreen loaded with potent antioxidants, like astaxanthin, grape juice, and sunflower shoot extract, to minimize the appearance of photoaging for a more youthful-looking complexion. Infused with raspberry seed and marula oils, Umbra Sheer™ delivers essential moisture and minimizes the look of fine lines and wrinkles for skin that appears healthy and preserved. This unique formulation is ideal for daily use without any white residue or greasiness. Umbra Sheer™ is suitable for all skin, including the most sensitive.
src: ./images/products/Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF30 by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil
info: Straight from the pip of the marula fruit, the pure, unrefined oil is virtually untouched by any chemical or fragrance, natural or synthetic. This super-absorbable oil will quickly sink in and diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Appropriate for all skin, including the most sensitive.
src: ./images/products/Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Wild Marula Tangle Spray
info: Nourishing plant oils—including sacha inchi seed, pracaxi seed, marula and argan—condition while penetrating the hair shaft to strengthen it against the high temperatures of hair straighteners and dryers. The multi-amino-acid blend adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce. Added to damp hair and before heat styling (or air drying), Wild Marula™ Tangle Spray leaves hair feeling healthier— never sticky, greasy or heavy. Wild Marula™ Tangle Spray has a pH of 4.5.
src: ./images/products/Wild Marula Tangle Spray by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: SupaBalm Rose
info: KNC Beauty’s SupaBalm promises to keep dehydrated lips kissably soft at home and on the go thanks to its tube that's perfectly sized for handbags. The creamy, tintless finish means it can double as a moisturising base with your favourite make-up products, while the cruelty-free, vegan and paraben-free formulation will give you plenty to smile about.

name: The Lip Mask
info: Nourish the lips with KNC Beauty’s lip mask and reap the benefits of plump and juicy fullness. The label formulates this hydrating mask as a playful and pouty sheet design to be placed delicately over the mouth, infusing the lips with natural collagen to stimulate regeneration and leaving them enriched with intense moisture.

name: SupaBalm Mint
info: KNC Beauty’s SupaBalm promises to keep dehydrated lips kissably soft at home and on the go thanks to its tube that's perfectly sized for handbags. The creamy, tintless finish means it can double as a moisturising base with your favourite make-up products, while the cruelty-free, vegan and paraben-free formulation will give you plenty to smile about.

name: Lip Scrub Set
info: ndulge in KNC Beauty’s Lip Scrub set – it's made for exfoliating, priming and prepping your pout. Enriched with creamy shea butter, sunflower oil and moringa oil, the cruelty-free formula offers hydrating and antioxidant properties, while the scrubbing tool gently smooths lips.

name: Lip Mask
info: Nourish the lips with KNC Beauty’s lip mask and reap the benefits of plump and juicy fullness. The label formulates this hydrating mask as a playful and pouty sheet design to be placed delicately over the mouth, infusing the lips with natural collagen to stimulate regeneration and leave them enriched with intense moisture.

name: Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask
info: Nourish the hair with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask, a hydrating hair mask packed with potent ingredients that work to revitalise dry hair and help to leave it looking soft, shiny and smooth. Fortified with phytonutrients inspired by green smoothie ingredients, this deep conditioning formula contains spinach, spirulina and chia seeds to help lock in moisture, while kiwi extract provides a boost of vitamin C and antioxidants to protect hair from environmental aggressors, encouraging stronger, healthier hair. The addition of nourishing avocado oil and cocoa seed butter work to detangle and restore dry hair without weighing it down, making this ideal for all hair types.
how: Apply a few drops to dry or damo hair, focusing on mid-length to ends or other areas of damage.
src: ./images/products/Avocado Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask by Briogeo.jpg

name: Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner
info: Give hair the nourishment it deserves with the nectar of banana and coconut thanks to Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner, a creamy haircare treatment that helps to reinvigorate dull-looking hair. Designed to be used every day, Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner is inspired by nutrient-rich smoothies and enriched with a blend of nourishing antioxidants. Formulated using 97% naturally derived ingredients and specifically developed for dull, dry and lifeless-looking hair, this vegan-friendly conditioner helps to deliver a healthy boost to locks. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner leaves hair softer, stronger and shinier.
how: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.

name: Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner
info: Create a new haircare and wellness routine with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner, a nourishing conditioner inspired by the juice wellness movement and supported by the powers of fruit acids and minerals. Mimicking the consistency of a rich fruit smoothie, this conditioner is infused with kale and apple extract as well as a range of vitamins, fruit and vegetable fatty acids and minerals. It has been formulated to replenish dull and lifeless locks, working in tandem with the Matcha and Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo for hair that dazzles. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner helps to support the natural vibrancy and strength of hair, hydrating every strand from root to tip and promoting healthy regrowth.
how: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.
src: ./images/products/Kale Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner by Briogeo.jpg

name: Matcha Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo
info: Unleash the inviting scent of apples with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Matcha and Apple Replenishing Shampoo, a deliciously rich and nutritious shampoo inspired by supercharged apple smoothies. Enriched with fruit and vegetable fatty acids, this shampoo is ideal for dry and dull locks. It works to visibly replenish the hair’s natural shine and vitality and helps ensure that nutrients are absorbed from root to tip. Vitamins and minerals penetrate every strand, supporting strength and nourishment without removing natural moisture. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Matcha and Apple Replenishing Shampoo is free from SLS and won’t accelerate colour fade. It is suitable for use on coloured and chemically treated locks.
how: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage for 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse.
src: ./images/products/Matcha Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo by Briogeo.jpg

name: Ginseng Biotin Volumizing Conditioner
info: Enhance hair’s volume with Briogeo Blossom and Bloom™ Ginseng and Biotin Volumizing Conditioner, a dual-action conditioner that contributes towards increased fullness and thickness in locks that are fine, limp or lifeless. This conditioner features a unique ingredient: maltodextrin, a natural sugar starch that works to coat strands to boost their appearance without leaving hair sticky or tangled. Ginseng and ginger stimulate blood flow to the scalp and promote healthier hair growth, while biotin strengthens follicles with repeated use. Briogeo Blossom and Bloom™ Ginseng and Biotin Volumizing Conditioner is 98% naturally derived, making it vegan friendly and cruelty-free. Free from phthalates, parabens, silicones, sulphates, DEA and artificial dyes, the conditioner supports long-term hair health.
src: ./images/products/Blossom & Bloo Ginseng Biotin Volumizing Conditioner by Briogeo.jpg

name: Deep Conditioning Hair Mask
info: Say ‘goodbye’ to dry, damaged and lifeless locks with the Briogeo Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask, a deeply nourishing and restorative hair masked infused with 98% natural ingredients and innovative haircare technology. This conditioning mask sets to work in minutes to restore the hair’s hydration levels and natural vitality. Banishing dry, brittle strands, it harnesses Briogeo’s unique NOVA Complex to deliver transformative nutrients where they’re needed most. B vitamins, rosehip and argan oils, collagen and algae extract ensure that tresses look shiny, sleek and radiant. The Briogeo Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask can help to reduce future breakages by up to 75% with repeated use. The mask is made without phthalates, parabens, silicones and artificial dyes and is certified cruelty-free and vegan friendly.
how: After shampooing, massage Don't Despair, Repair! into the hair, ensuring the conditioner is evenly applied. Leave in for 5-10 minutes before rinsing. For even deeper conditioning, cover the hair in a plastic cap to retain moisture while sitting under the dryer for 30 minutes, then rinse.

name: Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil
info: The Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Strengthening Treatment Oil fortifies hair with bioidentical lipids such as ceramides and essential fatty acids, to help restore and replenish for a smooth, silky finish. This lightweight oil is densely packed with hair-essential ingredients and a clinically-proven repair technology that works to reinforce hair cuticles and protect against future hair breakage.
how: After shampooing, massage into the hair from mid-length to ends. Leave in for 5 to 10 minutes before rinsing. Can be used once or twice per week in place or conditioner.

name: Charcoal Biotin Dry Shampoo
info: This unique dry shampoo is enriched with binchotan charcoal, which works to draw impurities away from the scalp, detoxify the hair follicles and normalise oil production. The presence of clay, biotin, tapioca and rice starches contributes towards reduced sebum at the hairs’ roots, which can extend the result of heat treatments such as blow-drying. Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo contains witch hazel extract, which helps to prevent excessive oiliness from returning. The dry shampoo provides a solution to oily hair rather than a temporary fix; locks receive a targeted burst of nutrients to encourage healthy growth and shine.
how: Combat the effects of an oily scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, a refreshing dry shampoo that cleanses locks for a healthier head of hair.

name: Scalp Revival Charcoal Tea Tree Scalp Treatment
info: Target the symptoms of a dry, irritable scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment, a cooling and soothing hair treatment enriched with peppermint and spearmint oils, binchotan charcoal, aloe vera, witch hazel, biotin, sodium hyaluronate and tea tree oil. This unique treatment works to draw oil and impurities away from the scalp, removing buildup and stimulating healthy hair growth for locks that are strong and shiny. The refreshing formula helps to reduce itchiness and irritation while providing antiseptic properties to soothe inflammation. The scalp is left hydrated and balanced, enriched with nutrients from 98% naturally derived ingredients that nourish and condition.
how: Part the hair into sections, apply 1-2 drops to each partition and massage into the scalp. Do not rinse out. The treatment should be applied after washing and before styling. It can also be applied before bedtime as a pre-shampoo scalp treatment.
src: ./images/products/Scalp Revival Charcoal Tea Tree Scalp Treatment by Briogeo.jpg

name: Charcoal Coconut Oil Micro-exfoliating Shampoo
info: Reduce obstructive product buildup for a soothed scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo, a nourishing shampoo that detoxifies and protects. Used to draw impurities away from the scalp and follicles, it contributes towards healthy hair growth. This shampoo is infused with binchotan charcoal, vegetable-derived micro-exfoliators, peppermint and spearmint oils, coconut oil, panthenol and tea tree oil. Massaged into wet hair, it works to remove dead skin cells and leftover product while reducing irritation and inflammation and preventing dryness and flakiness. The reduced is a balanced, healthy scalp and stronger locks. Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo has enriching super vitamins and 98% naturally derived ingredients. It detoxifies and exfoliates the scalp without sulphates, parabens, phthalates or gluten and is certified cruelty-free.
how: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage into the scalp and through to the ends. Rinse and repeat, as necessary. Apply your favorite Briogeo conditioner or treatment post-shampoo.
src: ./images/products/Scalp Revival Charcoal Coconut Oil Micro-exfoliating Shampoo by Briogeo.jpg

name: Banish Stick
info: The fast-acting formula of Indie Lee’s Banish Stick allows you to treat breakouts on the go and get your skin back to looking its best. Packed with the powerful sebum-dissolving properties of caviar lime extract and salicylic acid, this small but mighty formula is further enriched with sophora japonica flower and burdock root extracts to nourish the skin as it works.

name: Clearing mask
info: Deep cleanse and nourish the complexion with this gentle yet effective treatment mask. Salicylic and Glycolic Acids work to exfoliate dead skin cells. Bentonite Clay and Colloidal Sulfur help to gently draw out impurities. Zinc Oxide, Chamomile and Red Seaweed extracts ensure skin is left reconditioned and hydrated.
how: Apply a thin layer to damp, clean skin, avoiding the immediate eye area and allow the mask 20 minutes to work its magic. Gently rinse with warm water. Use weekly for optimum results.

name: Overnight Banish Gel
info: Ready to come to your rescue ahead of photo-filled occasions, the Overnight Banish Gel from Indie Lee acts fast on imperfections to ensure that your skin looks as good as you feel. Its kaolin and bentonite clays draw out – or rather ‘banish’ – excess oils and impurities from the skin, while the jasmine and vitamin-rich noni extracts work to nourish the complexion for glowing, spotlight-ready results.

name: Purifying Face Wash
info: Need a detox? Remove makeup and impurities with this antioxidant-rich foaming cleanser. Java Plum, Orange and Lavender extracts nourish the skin while dissolving excess sebum. Clove, Burdock and Mandarin promote a clearer, brighter complexion. Rose Damascena and Jasmine ensure skin feels soft and supple, never tight.

name: Radiance Renewal Peel
info: Reveal a brighter, more even-toned complexion with this Vitamin C rich exfoliating blend of Java Plum and Banana extracts. Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) from Caviar Lime combine with Mango derived Beta-Carotene, Vitamin A and Glycerin to leave skin looking soft, supple and luminous.
how: To optimize radiance and tone, gently wipe over dry, freshly cleansed skin avoiding the delicate eye and lip areas. Follow with serum from Prevent step. Use daily or 2-3 times weekly for sensitive skin

name: Restorative eye cream
info: A powerhouse eye cream for immediate results. Ectoin, antioxidant Centella and Paracress extracts help strengthen, protect and diminish the visible signs of aging. Conditioning algae and Licorice Root promote brighter, plumper, more youthful-looking skin.

name: Squalane Facial Oil
info: Inspired by nature, clean beauty brand Indie Lee is firmly rooted in the founder’s ambition to educate and empower us in the world of natural yet high-performance skincare, putting safety and ethical choices at the forefront of every formula. Take the Squalane Facial Oil; infused with 100% olive-derived squalane, it plumps, nourishes and provides intense hydration, improving your complexion’s overall texture and tone.

name: Stem Cell Serum
info: The power of plant stem cells meets hardworking botanicals. Echinacea Stem Cells help improve the appearance of firmer skin while Alpine Rose provides antioxidant benefits to combat lackluster skin. Nourishing Bamboo extracts and Hyaluronic Acid leave skin hydrated and supple.
how: Apply to freshly cleansed skin, morning and evening. Use alone or layer under your favorite moisturizer for enhanced environmental protection.

name: No.0 Intensive Bond Building Treatment
info: A professional-inspired treatment that primes hair for deeper repair with the highest dose of patented OLAPLEX technology in any take-home product. It rebuilds hair bonds, strengthens and protects hair integrity. Use as the first step in a two-part system with N°.3 Hair Perfector.
important: N°.0 bottle should last 3-6 applications, based on hair length and density.

name: No 3 Hair Perfector
info: A professional-inspired treatment that primes hair for deeper repair with the highest dose of patented OLAPLEX technology in any take-home product. It rebuilds hair bonds, strengthens and protects hair integrity. Use as the first step in a two-part system with N°.3 Hair Perfector.

name: No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo
info: N°4 Shampoo repairs and protects hair from everyday stresses — including damaged hair, split ends, and frizz — by re-linking broken bonds. Leaves hair easier to manage, shinier and healthier with each use. N°4 is color-safe and proven to reduce breakage and strengthen all types of hair.

name: No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner
info: Leaves hair easier to manage, shinier and healthier with each use. Protects and repairs damaged hair, split ends, and frizz by re-linking broken bonds. It is color-safe and will strengthen and leave your hair stronger than ever.

name: No.6 Bond Smoother
info: N°6 strengthens, moisturizes, and speeds up blow-dry times. Excellent for all hair types, including colored and chemically treated hair, and eliminates frizz and flyaways for up to 72 hours.

name: No.7 Bonding Oil
info: Dramatically increases shine, softness, and color vibrancy. N°7 minimizes flyaways and frizz, while providing UV/heat protection of up to 450°F/232°C.

name: Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo
info: Put this revolutionary (no, we're not being hyperbolic) dry shampoo to the spin class test and it will transform your sweaty, post-workout hair into bouncy, shiny perfection. This dry shampoo actually cleans hair, eliminating oil, sweat, and odor.
how: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 15-20 cm away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired.

name: Dry Shampoo Foam
info: It looks and feels like a mousse, but once dry, it acts like the best dry shampoo you've ever used for tackling seriously greasy roots.

name: Super Dry Shampoo
info: That time of the week again? Don’t let oily hair cramp your style. Our extra absorbent Super Dry Shampoo keeps you clean and volumized on the oiliest and flattest of hair days and has a fresh Melrose Place rose scent.

name: Dry Shampoo Darker tone
info: Your hair colour is personal, so your dry shampoo should be too. Introducing our first-ever dry shampoo in two formulas, for Dark Hair Tones and for Light Hair Tones. Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo Dark Tones contains ultra-fine, oil-absorbing rice starch that removes buildup and odor, leaving hair instantly clean and refreshed. Its UV-protecting, argan oil-infused formula breaks down instantly, leaving no dull residue and maintaining the natural richness of dark, brunette tones.
how: Shake well. Spray Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo 15–20 cm away from dry roots. Let dry, then massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo. Brush out.

name: Dry Shampoo Light Tones
info: Hair colour is personal. Dry shampoo should be too. By popular demand, Moroccanoil® launches its first-ever dry shampoo in two formulas, for Light Hair Tones and for Dark Hair Tones. Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo Light Tones contains ultra-fine rice starch that absorbs oil, buildup and odor, leaving hair instantly cleansed and refreshed. UV-protecting, argan oil-infused formula contains subtle violet undertones to balance brassiness in blonde hair and bring out the best in light tones.
how: Shake well. Spray Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo 15–20 cm away from dry roots. Let dry, then massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo. Brush out.

name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
info: The Ordinary Niacinamide + Zinc is one of the brand’s best selling products. It helps to lighten dark spots and balance out any uneven skin tone. It is excellent for acne prone skin since it is oil free and won’t clog pores. The product contains 10% pure Niacinamide (vitamin B3) which reduces the appearance of skin blemishes. When combined with Zinc, the two ingredients work together to clear out pores and control oil production. The Ordinary Niacinamide + Zinc is recommended as one of the best The Ordinary products for acne scars with skin discolouration.
how: Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: If topical Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid and/or Ethylated L-Ascorbic Acid) is used as part of skincare, it should be applied at alternate times with this formula (ideally Vitamin C in the PM and this formula in the AM). Otherwise, Niacinamide can affect integrity of the Vitamin C.

name: Bain TS Shampooing balancing shampoo
info: 95% natural ingredients. Vegan. Purifies and cleanses scalp without irritating it. Eliminates excess sebum. Leaves hair soft, light and shiny. Hair Type: oily scalp.
how: Wet hair thoroughly. Emulsify shampoo between your palms. Apply to scalp and massage, adding small amounts of water progressively as a gentle lather builds. Rinse thoroughly.
important: If you prefer to wash your hair once a week, two successive applications are necessary to properly remove buildup from dust, pollution, dry shampoos or styling products. For maximum oil control, follow with Tonique Vegetale, a leave-in spray for oily scalp.
src: ./images/products/Bain TS Shampooing balancing shampoo for oily scalp 200ml.jpg

name: Shampooing Crème Moelle de Bambou
info: A potent treatment shampoo, Shampoo Creme Moelle de Bambou is crammed with intensive active ingredients, to restore long locks to their glossy, luminous best. Wheat derivatives, Carrot, silk proteins and Bamboo Marrow combine to repair traumatised hair fibres from the first application; regenerating the hair shaft, replenishing shine, restoring flexibility and renewing manageability. Suitable for all hair types but especially those with brittle lengths and ends, this luxurious shampoo simultaneously cleanses and conditions to save precious time, whilst improving the appearance and quality of your crowning glory.
how: After detangling, wet hair thoroughly; pour some shampoo into the palm of one hand and gently rub hands together to spread the product over the inside of both hands. Next, place your fingers on your scalp and massage gently in circular motions, lifting hair from time to time. Repeat the process by adding small amounts of water each time in order to obtain a good lather. If you shampoo daily, one application is sufficient, otherwise two are recommended.

name: Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt
info: The product that started it all, Christophe Robin’s legendary purifying scrub was originally formulated to help remove chemical residue after in-salon colour treatments. Now, it enjoys a spot in endless beauty-editor bathrooms, famed for the way it leaves roots feeling incredibly clean and lengths full of movement. This one is seriously effective and lathers a lot, so best to save it for a once-weekly indulgence.
src: ./images/products/Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt (250 ml).jpg

name: No:Rinse Intensive Pore Minimizing Toner
info: If we’re talking about multi-faceted products, this toner should certainly be on the list. In fact, even to label it a ‘toner’ feels reductive considering it gently exfoliates, purifies, and controls sebum. While some balk at its pungent smell, that’s just a small price to pay for clearer, more mattified skin on application. In fact, across the board, some 90% of consumers noticed their pores were tighter than ever before.
how: Saturate a cotton pad and smooth over cleansed face. No rinsing is needed. Wait a few moments until dry before applying treatment or moisturizer. Use morning and evening.
important: Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

name: Regenerating Cleanser
info: Cleanse, nourish and repair tired skin with the luxurious formula of Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser. The innovative, non-foaming cleansing lotion freshens, cleanses and hydrates skin, without leaving it dry or tight. Powerful, natural active ingredients treat skin to intense nourishment, in a light formula which won’t clog pores. Potent extracts of pomegranate act as powerful antioxidants that refresh and hydrate the skin, while simultaneously encouraging the regeneration of healthy new skin cells, for a youthful glow. The inclusion of white willow bark in Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser’s rich formula works to clear pores and apricot seed powder extracts gently exfoliate the top layer of dead skin cells to inject radiance and rejuvenation into the face.
how: Morning and night, dampen your face and apply two pumps, then massage gently to activate the enzymes. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Renaissance Cleansing Gel
info: Purify and revitalise skin with Oskia Renaissance Cleansing Gel, an illuminating gel-to-oil facial cleanser that works to effortlessly remove makeup and impurities. Vitamin-rich and gentle, it strengthens and revitalises skin, promoting firmness and elasticity. Beginning as a rich pink balm, this unique cleanser melts into the skin and turns milky when mixed with water, then rinses cleanly away, along with any daily grime and makeup. Its gentle formula is perfect for repairing and soothing sun damaged and dry skin, while fortified bio-available vitamins and fruit enzymes remove dead skin cells and enhance collagen production. Refreshing rose and chamomile fragrance soothe the senses, while skin is left soft and supple, feeling revived and fresh.
how: Massage onto dry skin. Add a little water to emulsify into a white milk and remove with warm water or damp muslin cloth.

name: Retinoic Nutrient Face Oil
info: Discover the answer to stressed and irritated skin with Tata Harper Replenishing Nutrient Complex. It helps to retain the ideal skin balance and works to restore the skin to its former glory. This replenishing nutrient complex is lightweight and absorbs easily into the skin in a seamless way. It attempts to gradually reduce the visible effects of the ageing process so that the naturally youthful appearance of the face lasts longer. It contains an intensive therapeutic complex that helps to brighten, soften and rejuvenate skin from within. This lightweight oil needs to be applied just before going to bed simply by rolling a thin layer onto the neck and face by gently massaging it in circular motions. This oil can even be applied to dry cuticles as it also offers healing and restorative benefits.
how: Massage into skin. Use AM & PM.
src: ./images/products/Retinoic Nutrient Face Oil by TATA HARPER.jpg

name: Scrub Shampoo
info: Yes, your favourite bouji perfume line also makes a scalp scrub, and it's unsurprisingly one of the most luxe around. Black sea salt makes light work of grease and product build-up, while avocado and olive oils deliver deep nourishment. Of course, there's a very sophisticated botanical basil scent to lure you in, too. This plant-based formula is made with black sea salt (to stimulate), olive oil (to strengthen), avocado oil (to nourish), and is also paraben-free, phthalate-free and artificial colorant-free.
how: Massage into skin. Use AM & PM.

name: Serene Scalp Exfoliating Scrub
info: Oribe knows its stuff when it comes to seriously healthy, happy hair. This powerful scrub uses exfoliating beads to remove oil, dirt and product build-up whilst AHAs and fruit enzymes give hair follicles a deep cleanse.

name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial
info: Radiate youth with smoother, more evenly toned skin with the help of Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial. This at-home facial works to gently exfoliate the skin with a 25% AHA / 2% BHA blend that combines glycolic, tartaric, citric, lactic and salicylic acids. name: Lactic Acid 10% + HA
info: Lactic Acid is an alpha hydroxy acid that exfoliates the skin. This 10% formulation offers mild exfoliation and is supported with a purified Tasmanian pepperberry known to reduce signs of inflammation and sensitivity that is often associated with exfoliation. This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative to help reduce irritation associated with acid use. This derivative is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally and this colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time.
important: Lactic Acid should not be used on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Please refer to additional sun protection note and other warnings in provided Directions.  Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
how: Apply once per day, ideally in the PM. Can be diluted with other treatments to reduce strength until skin develops tolerance. Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Avoid contact with eyes. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
info: The molecular size of HA determines its depth of delivery in the skin. This formulation combines low-, medium- and high-molecular weight HA, as well as a next-generation HA crosspolymer at a combined concentration of 2% for multi-depth hydration in a water-based formula. This system is supported with the addition of Vitamin B5 which also enhances surface hydration.
important: Hyaluronic Acid is found in the skin naturally but its natural function within the skin is not hydration. Many products have used HA to claim hydration benefits, but HA is too large of a molecule to penetrate the skin and instead sits on the surface and can draw moisture out of the skin making the surface feel soft and hydrated temporarily, while making you feel like you need more HA after the product is rinsed. This formula uses three forms of HA with varying molecular weights, as well as an HA crosspolymer, to offer multi-depth hydration and visible plumping without drawing water out of the skin solely to improve temporary surface hydration.
how: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM before creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Daily Face Moisturizer
info: A combination of a hyaluronic acid derivative, glycerin and oat bran extract make this the perfect lightweight formula to hydrate oily skin without feeling too heavy.
important: A combination of a hyaluronic acid derivative, glycerin and oat bran extract make this the perfect lightweight formula to hydrate oily skin without feeling too heavy.

name: DeliKate Recovery Cream
info: Soothe skin the Hollywood way with Kate Somerville Delikate Soothing Cream. Designed by skincare expert to the stars Kate Somerville, this ultra-rich cream has been formulated to help protect and repair the skin, leaving stressed out and sensitive complexions feeling cool and calm. Designed especially for sensitive skin, Kate Somerville Delikate Soothing Cream can also help with temporary issues of irritation, redness and sensitivity and works to defend the skin against environmental aggressors such as pollutants and sunburn. Kate Somerville Delikate Soothing Cream helps to rebuild the skin’s delicate barrier while nourishing and moisturising, leaving the complexion looking fresher, healthier and more luminous.

name: Exfolikate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment
info: Get a brighter, healthier-looking complexion in minutes with the Kate Somerville Exfolikate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment, a skincare treatment that reveals a smoother, softer and more radiant complexion. This complexion-enhancing exfoliator is formulated with AHA, lactic acid and fruit enzymes to dissolve dead skin cells, while silica acts as a physical exfoliant to slough them away. Honey and aloe vera provide a soothing sensation, and soy-lipids support the skin’s natural defences. Kate Somerville Exfolikate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment can be used once or twice each week. Start by wetting the face, then apply a thin layer of the treatment. Next, massage it in for 30 seconds using gentle circular movements. Then leave to work for 2 minutes before rinsing and drying.
how: Use once or twice each week to keep skin radiant. Gently apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face, massaging in a circular motion for 30 seconds. Leave on for an additional one to two minutes to activate the enzymes. Rinse off and pat dry. Redness may appear up to 20 minutes post treatment due to an increase in circulation. For extremely sensitive skin, do not use.
src: ./images/products/Exfolikate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment by Kate Somerville.jpg

name: ExfoliKate Glow Moisturizer
info: Allow any complexion to reach its full potential with the Kate Somerville Exfolikate Glow Moisturizer, a skincare treatment that helps brighten dull complexions. This brightness-boosting formula is fortified with lactic and glycolic acids to help dissolve dead skin cells, allowing a more glowing complexion to emerge. To ensure that skin remains soothed throughout the process, calming napol cactus fruit extract is added. Kate Somerville Exfolikate Glow Moisturizer can be used two times a day, in the morning and the evening. Just smooth on to the face and neck in a thin layer. It can be used alone as a glow-boosting treatment or combined with a Kate Somerville serum.
how: AM and PM. Use twice a day. Apply a thin, even layer to face and neck. Use alone or layer over your favorite serum.
important: Avoid contact with lip and eye area. Do not use on irritated or damaged skin. Keep away from children. This product contains Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) which may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and increase the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

name: The Rich Cream
info: Stimulate the skin’s natural processes of rejuvenation and work to dramatically improve the complexion’s appearance with Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream. This nourishing face cream is suitable for normal to dry skin types. Rich in omega 6 fatty acids and antioxidants, this cream features replenishing argan, avocado and evening primrose oils to help protect the skin against free radical damage. Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream also acts as a shield against dry climates and is ideal as part of a night-time routine. For best results, use both morning and evening by applying the cream onto cleansed, dry skin, smoothing the desired amount over the face, neck and décolleté.
how: For optimum usage, on cleansed, dry skin, smooth two pumps over the face, neck and decollete morning and evening.

name: Rich Night Cream
info: The Cetaphil Rich Hydrating Night Cream contains emollients and humectants that bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss too.
how: Use this before bed and it wil leave you with soft, hydrated, excuse-me-where’d-you-get-that-time-machine skin when you wake up.

name: Cleansing Mask with Lemon
info: Specially formulated for coloured or sensitive hair, the Christophe Robin Cleansing Mask with Lemon is a non-detergent, low-lathering shampoo that improves colour, enhances shine and restores nutrients lost during chemical treatments and colouring. Lemon Zest extract, Chamomile and St. John's wort extract help to prevent the leakage of artificial pigments to prolong colour vibrancy. The acidic pH of the Lemon Peel seals the hair cuticle to enable the colour to remain dense and vivid. The ultra-hydrating multi-benefit treatment cleanses, exfoliates and purifies the scalp while providing intense care to the hair fibre. The result is silky-soft hair with a lustrous shine and a scalp that feels soothed and comfortable. Revitalise your hair with this intensive caring formula. Free from parabens, silicone, SLS and colourants.
how: Wet your hair thoroughly. Apply the shampoo to your hair. Lather. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Regenerating Mask with Rare Prickly Pear Seed Oil
info: For hair that looks and feels fantastic try this quick acting restorative mask. Christophe Robin Regenerating Mask has a creamy formula that is quickly absorbed into the hair for a long-lasting action from the root to the tip. The regenerating mask repairs, protects and smooths hair in just a few minutes from application. This mask provides deep down repair and protects and revives the pigments in coloured hair. The hair is reinforced from the inside for a deep repair. Prickly pear seed oil has antioxidant and regenerative benefits whilst plant ceramides restructure the hair to make it stronger and increase shine. Inula flower extracts revive and protect pigments in natural or coloured hair. Christophe Robin Regenerating Mask is an intensive treatment for hair that reduces hair breakage and split ends for a soft, smooth radiant finish.
how: After shampooing, apply a small amount, massaging thoroughly from the scalp down to the ends. Lather the product while gradually adding water, then rinse thoroughly.
src: ./images/products/Regenerating Mask with Rare Prickly Pear Seed Oil by Christophe Robin.jpg

name: Dramatically Different Hydrating Clearing Jelly
info: Clinique’s innovative moisturiser has a cooling jelly texture, delivering lightweight hydration across your skin. A custom-blend formula, it’s completely oil-free to avoid heavy build-ups, unwanted residues and shiny finishes, meaning your skin will seem completely natural after use. Locking in essential water for up to 24 hours with Hyaluronic Acid, the jelly wards off dryness for a supple, smooth surface. It helps to diminish the look of imperfections, creating a clearer illusion while Lactobacillus Probiotic Ferment contributes to improving a blotchy tone. This makes it ideal for anyone who often suffers from redness, promoting soothing comfort that lasts throughout the day. Thanks to Salicylic Acid, you’ll also benefit from light exfoliation as the jelly supports the natural renewal cycles of your face, removing dead layers of skin for a more refreshed feel.
how: Apply to skin after cleansing.

name: Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel
info: Replenish the look of your complexion with the Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. The lightweight, airy formula glides effortlessly across your base, absorbing fast to avoid any kind of heavy, sticky residue being left over. The oil-free moisturiser is perfect for people that are prone to excess shine, offering the appearance of a more balanced, mattified skin tone. The ingenious formula is infused with potent and long-lasting Glycerin, along with Sodium Hyaluronate, which work in unison to lock in hydration for touchable, supple softness. A gentle, rejuvenating cocktail of Cucumber Extracts, Barley and Sun Flour Seed works to promote the illusion of a stronger, healthier-looking base, encouraging a radiant and lit-from-within glow. Ideal for combination to oily skin. Oil free and non-comedogenic.
how: Use twice a day, morning and night. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed
src: ./images/products/Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel 125ml with Pump.jpg

name: Dramatically Different Moisturising Lotion+
info: Treat your skin to Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, the third step in your skincare routine. Delivering a hydrating veil, the rich and creamy moisturiser quenches skin's thirst whilst strengthening its barrier, so essential moisture stays locked in for all day hydration. After use, skin will look soft, hydrated and radiant with a healthy glow. Skin looks youthful for longer. Quick absorbing. Ideal for very dry to dry, and dry combination skin.
how: Use twice a day, morning and night. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed. Cleansed, exfoliated skin accepts moisture better. A little goes a long way. Massage a small pump of lotion into skin wherever it’s dry.
src: ./images/products/Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Lotion+ 125ml with Pump.jpg

name: Moisture Surge 100 Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
info: Clinique’s Moisture Surge™ has been revamped with a new and improved formula. Boasting the same refreshing gel-crème texture as the , the 100 Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator provides deep and long-lasting hydration to all skin types. The oil-free multitasker sits perfectly beneath makeup and can also be used as a highlighter or dry skin-quencher anywhere on the body or even on brittle split ends. The moisturiser is powered by Auto-Replenishing Technology, which create an internal oasis that continually rehydrates skin over time. It’s also enriched with exclusive Aloe Bio-Ferment, a blend of moisturising actives that undergo a unique fermentation process to jack up its nutritional vigour. Added Hyaluronic Acid also helps bind moisture to skin to create a ‘moisture reservoir’, while Cica (Tiger Grass) soothes irritation and calms redness. Smooth over your face, dry elbows, cuticles and even hair ends for a plumping effect. Suitable for all skin types.
how: Use daily for immediate moisture. For a midday boost, tap on over makeup. Or use as a 5-minute mask: massage onto clean skin and blot off excess with a tissue.

name: Moisture Surge Hydrating Water Gel Concentrate
info: Drench the visage in essential moisture with the Clinique Moisture Surge Hydrating Water Gel Concentrate; an innovative formula that seeks to eliminate dryness, whilst preventing visible signs of ageing. The lightweight, water-gel concentrate effortlessly smoothes over the visage, absorbing instantly to offer skin a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture. The unique, moisturising formula utilises Liquid-Sphere Technology, which works in synergy with water-binding ingredients to break the cycle of dryness, whilst shielding the complexion from environmental aggressors. After use, expect a soothed visage that is calm and comfortably hydrated. Allergy tested. Non- acnegenic. Oil and fragrance free.
how: Apply AM and PM on clean skin.
src: ./images/products/Clinique Moisture Surge Hydrating Water Gel Concentrate 48ml.jpg

name: Dramatically Different Hydrating Jelly
info: Replenish your complexion with Clinique Dramatically Different Hydrating Jelly; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that helps to support and strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid and innovative Clean Shield Technology™ (a blend of Sunflower Seed, Barley Extract and Cucumber), the water-jelly texture penetrates deeply to deliver 24-hour hydration. Oil-free and non-sticky, it enhances suppleness and radiance, whilst defending against the damaging effects of pollution. Skin feels smooth and moisturised with a healthy glow. Suitable for all skin types. Dermatologist developed. Allergy tested. Oil, fragrance, paraben and phthalate free.

name: Elasticizer
info: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.
how: Apply before shampooing. Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage. Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed. Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer. Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed. Suitable for use on coloured hair.
important: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only.

name: Resistance Therapiste Masque
info: Kérastase Resistance Therapiste Masque is a butter-textured mask that deeply penetrates hair to restore strength and boost elasticity. Suitable for extremely damaged and over-processed hair, the lightweight mask revitalises hair strands and locks in moisture so you can experience silky smooth, hydrated locks. Its FIBRA-KAP™ formula is enriched with six amino acids to replenish protein and promote strong, healthy hair.
how: Apply to washed and towel-dried hair. Massage onto lengths and ends. Leave in for 5 minutes, emulsify and rinse thoroughly.

name: Restore Repair Mask
info: Breathe new life into locks with the Living Proof Restore Repair Mask, a transformative treatment that works to reduce breakages by up to 70%. It helps tresses to retain their moisture, and contributes towards smoother, sleeker, softer hair that lasts longer between washes. This nourishing mask repairs cuticles without weighing them down, supporting the hair as it heals. Its conditioning blend contains a biometric emollient blend, with amino acids and meadowfoam seed oil to replenish hair’s natural, protective barrier and defend every strand against future damage. The Living Proof Restore Repair Mask is safe for coloured and chemically treated hair, and is formulated without parabens, phthalates, sulphates or silicone. It is certified cruelty-free.
how: After shampooing, apply generously from roots to ends – leave for five minutes before rinsing. Use 1-2 times per week as needed, instead of your normal conditioner.

name: Treatment Masque
info: Regain control of a lustrous mane with the Ouai Treatment Masque, a haircare product that is designed to help restore dry or damaged locks. This healing hair masque has been developed with the Ouai Smart Technology Complex and features a special blend of ingredients to support healthier cuticles, restore moisture balance and provide protection from additional damage. It leaves each strand with a softer and sleeker feeling. For the best results from the Ouai Treatment Masque, use after shampooing. Begin by dispensing a small amount onto the fingertips, then work the product evenly into the hair. Next, leave for between 5 and 10 minutes before rinsing. This masque can also be used on dry hair for quick conditioning top-ups.
how: Smooth evenly through hair, combing with fingers if needed. Chill out for 5-10 minutes, then rinse.

name: Deep cleansing oil
info: There’s a reason most beauty editors consider this cleansing oil their desert-island product: The antioxidant-rich olive oil removes makeup so gently (and thoroughly!) that it actually makes washing your face kinda fun. The silky-smooth texture is suuuper lightweight, too, so it doesn’t actually feel like oil on your skin.
important: This the best hydrating cleansing oil you'll ever find.

name: Skinesis Overnight Exfoliating Booster
info: As a response to her client's saying that they don't have time to exfoliate, skincare-guru-to-the-stars Sarah Chapman created this overnight elixir to clear away dead surface cells and shrink enlarged pores.
how: Apply on cleansed skin at bedtime, and allow to dry. Use regularly three nights a week, or every night as a treatment course.
src: ./images/products/Skinesis Overnight Exfoliating Booster by Sarah Chapman.jpg

name: Black Rose Cream Mask
info: Sisley’s Black Rose Cream Mask is a pink-toned cream formula delicately scented with rose, and designed to plump, brighten and awaken the skin in a matter of minutes. Due to its anti-ageing active ingredients, those concerned by fine lines, wrinkles and dullness will perhaps see the best results from this mask. However its deep hydrating action makes it great for dry and dehydrated skin in need of extra moisture. Those with blemish-prone skin may find it too rich for regular use and prefer to limit it to once per fortnight.
how: The instructions suggest using the mask two or three times per week, applying a thick layer over the face and leaving on for 15 mins before wiping away the excess. However many of its ardent fans suggest leaving it on overnight - wake up with plumped-up, brightened skin come morning.

name: Color Continue Shampoo
info: Lasting color starts with healthy hair. Moroccanoil Color Continue Shampoo helps improve haircolor retention by restoring hair’s integrity with each and every use. This gentle, sulfate-free cleanser is formulated with COLORLINK™, our groundbreaking technology that repairs each strand both physically and chemically in three ways: 1. Rebuilds the hair’s keratin structure, locking color within, 2. Forms a protective shield to minimize color washout, 3. Uses ArganID™ technology to infuse argan oil into the hair’s cortex, sealing and repairing the hair.
how: Massage Color Continue Shampoo through wet hair and scalp. Because Color Continue Shampoo is a specialty low-pH cleanser, foaming will be minimal. To activate a richer lather, add more water. Rinse the hair thoroughly and repeat if needed. For optimal results, use with Color Continue Conditioner.

name: Delicate Volumising Shampoo with Rose Extracts
info: Nourish your hair and create volume with this delicate volumising shampoo that has been especially formulated to protect and nourish your hair. Christophe Robin Volumising Shampoo has been especially created to protect colour, volumise body and nourish the hair fibres. The shampoo contains rose extracts and is gentle on the scalp. Hair does not dry out and is kept feeling soft and fresh. The shampoo’s gelified formula with rose extracts is enriched with baobab leaves and rose oils extract to cleanse the hair and lock the Ph balance. This will limit the amount of pigment loss from the hair meaning that its colour remains fresh and brilliant. For hair that looks fresh, vibrant and with increased volume use this delicate shampoo. Suitable for fine hair, coloured hair or sensitive hair.
how: Apply on damp hair, lather, then rinse.
src: ./images/products/Delicate Volumising Shampoo with Rose Extracts by Christophe Robin.jpg

name: Moisturising Hair Oil with Lavender
info: Create hair that is soft, shiny and manageable with this ultra-nourishing and protecting Lavender Oil treatment. Christophe Robin Lavender Oil treatment is an ultra-nourishing and protective treatment that is suitable for all hair types. The treatment contains a combination of oils which include lavender and palm oil which work to restore the hair’s elasticity leaving it feeling reinvigorated. Damaged hair will be restored to reveal hair that is more manageable, shiny and soft. Contains vitamin E to treat the scalp. Plant oils protect the density and shine of the hair colour. Christophe Robin Lavender Oil treatment will protect your hair from the damage caused by the sea, sun and wind and other environmental elements that can damage hair.
how: Leave it as long as you want. It will restore the lipid layer, prevent breakage and deeply nourish hair. How does it work? This oil has a balm texture and liquefies when heated. This means you can target specific areas when you apply it. Its SPF6 also allows you to protect hair from the sun. As a protective treatment: apply a small amount of oil before bathing or sun exposure. As an intensive pre-treatment conditioner: before using the Cleansing Cream with Lemon or your usual shampoo, apply the oil throughout your hair, on ends and along your hairline. Leave on for one hour to overnight. The lavender oil has soothing properties which promote a good night’s sleep.
src: ./images/products/Moisturising Hair Oil with Lavender by Christophe Robin.jpg

name: Shade Variation Care Baby Blond
info: Blond hair colour or highlights can turn grey or yellow over time, and natural blond hair can also look dull and lack shine. The shade variation care baby blond neutralises yellow and grey tones and restores pure, radiant and defined highlights.
how: Wash your hair with your usual shampoo or the cleansing purifying scrub with sea salt to renew the hair fibers. Then, apply the shade variation vare to towel-dried hair from root to tip. Lather by massaging into hair and leave in for 5-30 minutes, depending on the desired intensity. Rinse thoroughly.
src: ./images/products/Shade Variation Care Baby Blond by Christophe Robin.jpg

name: Shade Variation Mask Golden Blonde
info: Blond hair can look dull and lifeless. Coloured or highlighted hair can turn grey or too transparent over time. The shade variation care golden blond redensifies dull blond hair for a natural golden shade.
how: Wash your hair with your usual shampoo or the cleansing purifying scrub with sea salt to renew the hair fibers. Then, apply the shade variation vare to towel-dried hair from root to tip. Lather by massaging into hair and leave in for 5-30 minutes, depending on the desired intensity. Rinse thoroughly.

name: JuJu Bar
info: This multitasking bar looks toward thermal mud and bamboo powder to cleanse and gently exfoliate your sensitive skin simultaneously. It is also 100 percent fragrance- and soap-free and has a pH level of 6.34, so it definitely won’t strip your skin of its natural oils.
how: Wet the JuJu Bar and with your hands, apply lather to the skin in a gentle, circular motion. Massage over face, neck and chest. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. The Juju Bar may be used day or night, up to 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin.

name: Serum de Soie Sublimateur
info: This serum has a certain je ne sais quoi that puts it ahead of the pack. Although it's technically a serum, thanks to its vegetal and Karanja oil base, we're going to go ahead and call it one of the best hair oils for blondes. Nourishing and formulated to counteract disturbances like heat and sun damage, lightened strands are left soft and satiny post-application.
how: Apply to damp or dry hair. Apply 2-3 pumps on medium-length hair, up to 5 on long hair. Brush through hair to smooth and distribute the product thoroughly. Do not rinse.
important: Slip into your bag and use mid-day to tame fly-away hair
src: ./images/products/Leonor Greyl Serum de Soie Sublimateur (Smoothes, Detangles, Protects and Nourishes).jpg

name: Treatment Original
info: One of the most well-known hair oils around, Argan earned the nickname of ‘liquid gold’, thanks to its universal appeal. Argan oil contains a mix of antioxidants (like Vitamin E) and fatty acids. Fun fact, the sebum our bodies naturally produce is made up of a high percentage of fatty acids too, so if you have dry hair, applying this oil is a good way to lubricate your strands if they’re looking a bit dull. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, strengthening proteins and shine-enhancing vitamins, this completely transformative treatment detangles, speeds up drying time and boosts shine – leaving hair smooth, manageable and nourished with each use. Discover the original.
how: Apply 1–2 pumps to clean, towel-dried hair, from mid-length to ends. Blow-dry or let dry naturally. Apply on dry hair to tame flyaways or condition split ends.

name: Restore Shampoo
info: Treat the hair to a nourishing boost with Living Proof’s Restore Shampoo, a gentle shampoo designed to improve the appearance and quality of dry or damaged hair. Formulated with a sulphate-free surfactant system and PlyfluororEster, Living Proof’s moisture-controlling molecule, Restore Shampoo gently cleanses the hair without the stripping that occurs with sulphate-based shampoos. It also helps replenish moisture and contributes to improved manageability without the use of oils and silicones. Powered by Living Proof’s patented Healthy Hair Molecule, OFPMA, the Restore System assists in the protection of hair from future damage and helps strengthen it to become more resistant to breakage.
how: Apply to wet hair and massage into a rich lather, covering all areas of the scalp and hair. Rinse.

name: Split End Serum
info: Put an end to split ends with Virtue Split End Serum, a protective serum that helps to seal and repair broken ends and safeguard against future damage. Enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku™ the serum works to heal, nourish and condition. Split ends can make any day a bad hair day. This serum is formulated with pea protein, hydrolysed quinoa and baobab seed oil, which help to provide protection against thermal damage, improve moisture retention and inspire a lustrous shine. Hair will feel rich, silky and full of life – and free from those split ends. Virtue Split End Serum is made without the use of parabens, phthalates, sulphates and artificial colours. It is suitable for use on all hair types and colours, including locks that have been dyed, highlighted or chemically treated.
how: Using your fingertips, apply quarter-sized amount to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends. Style as usual.

name: MINU Illuminating and Protective Shampoo for Coloured Hair
info: Davines Minu Shampoo (winner of Self Magazine's 2015 Self-Approved Beauty Awards!) uses caper blossoms to gently cleanse, protect and extend the lifespan of your colored hair. With a fresh, orange blossom fragrance, MINU Illuminating and Protective Shampoo generates a rich, indulgent foam to eliminate build-up and dirt without stripping your hair of its oils (or its colour!). Perfect for dyed or chemically-treated tresses, this luxurious formula contains a cocktail of mild surfactants to attract and dissolve dulling dirt and impurities, while caper extract helps to protect without adding weight to compromise movement or leave hair looking limp. Your hair will feels smooth, soft and manageable with a luminous, mirror-like shine – and your colour will maintain its fresh-from-the-salon vibrancy for longer – so you can postpone that appointment (and save yourself some precious pennies).
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage gently and rinse, repeat shampoo application, then follow with MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner.
src: ./images/products/MINU Illuminating and Protective Shampoo for Coloured Hair.jpg

name: MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner for Coloured Hair
info: Davines Minu Conditioner is an illuminating protective conditioner, and this year’s winner of 'Best Conditioner' in Byrdie's 2019 Eco Beauty Awards. A perfect, post-cleanse treatment for fragile, coloured hair, Davines’s MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner replenishes, separates and assists with detangling – minimising ‘stretching’ and breakage – while enhancing hair’s brilliance so your colour looks enviably lustrous. Because the dyeing process compromises hair’s health, use this fortifying and revitalising treatment to infuse each strand with precious nutrients and in turn, bolster hair’s resilience. It’s best used in conjunction with the rest of Davines’s ‘MINU’ range – to protect and enhance the health of chemically-treated tresses.
how: Apply to towel dried hair after using shampoo. Leave on for 5-10 minutes, comb through then rinse. Dry the hair.
src: ./images/products/MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner for Coloured Hair.jpg

name: A-Passioni Retinol Cream
info: Ideal for all those who're already acquainted with the wonders of retinol (this can trigger irritation and peeling if your skin is sensitive, or if you're new to the retinol realm), Drunk Elephant’s game-changing A-Passioni Retinol Cream is the perfect addition to your evening-time routine. A powerhouse complex, this potent, silicone-free formulation of 1% retinol boasts comforting and nourishing ingredients (passionfruit, apricot, kale, winter cherry extracts, skin-firming peptides and essential fatty acids), to give lazy skin cells a boot up their bottoms!
how: Apply a pea-sized amount or less to a clean and dry face. Limit initial use to once or twice a week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night and then finally up to every night (as tolerated). Proceed with caution if you're sensitive or new to retinol - this may induce redness/irritation to begin with and you may incur some flakiness until your skin acclimatises. Avoid using the night before a big event/special occasion (unless you're already a retinol addict)!
important: Avoid applying to eye area and use a broad spectrum SPF during the day.

name: Resurgence Renewing Eye Cream
info: Diminish puffiness and dark circles with Murad Resurgence Renewing Eye Cream helping to firm and restore the delicate eye area. Swap medium-to-deep crow's feet and wrinkles for an illuminated, bright appearance! Let Murad Resurgence Renewing Eye Cream dramatically increase moisture, elasticity and firmness with wild yam and soybean, to leave your eye area looking healthy. The eye brightening complex reduces dark circles and illuminates the eye area to awaken tired eyes.
how: Apply every day after cleansing and toning. Pat a small amount onto the brow bone and beneath the eye and gently massage.

name: RE Pigment
info: Utilising ultra-advanced active brightening technologies, NIOD’s RE: Pigment is your new secret weapon in the battle against uneven tone and hyperpigmentation. Highly saturated yet impressively lightweight, this emollient solution incorporates modern advances in biotechnology and peptide technology to counteract one of the most difficult to treat dermal concerns. The core active technologies include diglucosyl gallic acid (which is proven to be 60 more active than kojic acid in visibly brightening skin tone) and a redness reducing azelaic acid and glycine combination. Alongside these, white shiitake ferment – a purified bio-derivative that targets the appearance of dark spots within a week of use – and red evodia fruit derivatives, an ingredient used in Chinese medicine to encourage radiance and even tone.
how: Shake lightly. Apply serum to face AM and PM. If used as part of a NIOD regimen, apply after CAIS but before MMHC. Avoid unprotected UV exposure when using this formula.

name: Retinol Serum
info: This multi-benefit serum speeds up cell turnover to give your skin a renewed appearance and improve clarity. The simple yet effective formula combines 1% stable retinol with a slightly stronger 0.5% granactive retinoid to kick-start your skin’s natural renewal process while Squalane soothes and moisturises to prevent drying. This potent skincare hero offers the perfect introduction to retinols, helping to reveal a brighter, clearer and more youthful-looking complexion.
how: Use in the evening after cleansing and toning. Apply a pea-sized amount of serum to the fingers and pat into the skin using tapping motions. Avoid the immediate eye area and ensure that you are using a daily sunscreen as retinols may increase sun sensitivity.
important: Some redness or flakiness may occur following the first uses of this product due to increased cell turnover. You can build your skin's tolerance by using the product a few times a week and gradually increasing to daily use.

name: Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG
info: Tired, puffy eyes after hours staring at a computer screen? Try this featherlight serum, which features an extremely high concentration of caffeine and EGCG (a potent polyphenol found in green tea). Basically, the equivalent of a really good night's sleep in a jar.
how: Massage a small amount onto the eye contour AM and PM.

name: Caffeine Eye Serum
info: This revitalising serum boasts a Matrixyl 3000 peptide with Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract to stimulate collagen production, helping to combat fine lines and wrinkles. This invigorating eye serum works like your morning coffee to re-awaken the complexion and leave you feeling ready to take on the day!
how: After cleansing apply a small amount of serum to the eye contour using a gentle patting motion. Follow with your regular serums and moisturisers.

name: Eye Masks
info: If you need to hide the evidence of a happy hour gone overboard, a good cry sesh, or the fact that you haven't slept a full eight hours in months, these eye patches are the answer (and they only take 15 minutes to work their magic). Keep mine it the fridge for extra cooling benefits and stick them on whenever you need some soothing, smoothing, and hydration (thank you, retinol and aloe vera extract).

name: Glow Tonic
info: Never has a beauty product been so aptly named. Packed with AHAs that dissolve and buff away dead cells on the skin's surface, one swipe reveals juicy, glowing skin underneath. A hero product for both the brand and a team Byrdie staple, this formula is lauded as much for the affordable price tag as it is for the effective-yet-gentle formula. Glycolic acid is balanced out with soothing aloe and ginseng, which increases circulation for further glow-enhancing effects. It leaves your complexion clear and radiant, without any unwanted redness or uncomfortable tingling sensation.
how: Use either in the AM and PM or when needed. Cleanse your face, then saturate a cotton pad with the Glow Tonic and sweep across face, neck and décolletage (avoiding the eye area). Follow with a serum or moisturiser.

name: Sub Zero De-Puffing Eye Mask
info: The 111 Skin Sub-zero De-puffing Eye Mask is the secret weapon of A-listers and models during fashion month and awards season. Bella Hadid was spotted backstage at New York Fashion Week's Brandon Maxwell show with the clever masks on her eyes to pep up her skin ahead of her catwalk appearance, while Ashley Graham and Olivia Palermo are also staunch fans of the brand. Inspired by the invigorating effects of extreme cold on the skin, the £12 hydrogel mask works to tackle signs of fatigue by alleviating puffiness and improving skin resilience. A powerful tetrapeptide and marine complex works to restore contours and tighten stress lines to fortify the delicate eye area. With its effects intensified if kept in the fridge, the appearance of dark circles are apparently reduced, resulting in an uplifted, enlivened eye area - and who doesn't want that?

name: Black Tea Age-delay Body Cream
info: Treat your body like your face with Fresh’s lotion, which infuses age-fighting antioxidants with smoothing mango-seed butter into the skin for a non-greasy, glowing finish.

name: Vinosculpt Lift & Firm Body Cream
info: Caudalíe's French skincare offerings have an ultra-loyal following, and this firming body cream is at the top of reviewers' lists. Shea butter and iris extract work in tandem with the brand's signature hero ingredients—grape seed oil and grape polyphenols—to moisturize, firm, lift, and tighten the skin wherever you decide to apply. A review states: 'I had a baby about 10 months ago and had ripples on my stomach from weight loss and stretched skin. I just applied this cream for the first time a few hours ago, and I can't believe my eyes. The ripples are completely gone. It looks like they were never there. I am in complete shock. I will definitely continue using this cream. I do agree with other users, the smell is very potent, and I am sensitive to perfumes. The pros outweigh the cons though.'

name: Shea Butter Hand Cream
info: A best-seller for a reason, this super-rich hand cream works miracles overnight. Keep it on your bedside to soothe dry, chapped hands while you sleep.

name: Ultimate Strength hand salve
info: The blend of avocado, eucalyptus and sesame seed oil gives this formula a rich, soothing and hydrating base. This isn’t a light, quick application kind of hand cream as it’s super thick, but it makes the perfect treat after a long day of hand washing.

name: Hand Crème
info: Ok, this hand cream is spenny but it smells like you have your life completely together, you do not suffer fools gladly and you have ticked off 7 things on your to-do before 10 am because you’re a boss. The scent is gardenia, ylang ylang, violet and white musk and the texture is rich and creamy but sinks in quickly (you’re a boss you have things to do!).

name: Buttermask for lips
info: This rich mask contains fairly traded coconut oil and wild mango butter, which help refresh the lips before the morning arrives. It works to hydrate, nourish and condition dry and tired lips and promotes a softer, suppler smile.

name: Black Tea Kombucha Essence Treatment
info: Boost your skincare ritual with this powerhouse liquid prep step from Fresh. This facial treatment essence is a silky leave-on formula powered by kombucha -fermented sweet black tea that increases moisture and luminosity for a radiant, lustrous complexion. The highly concentrated age-delay treatment provides daily antioxidant and anti-pollution protection, which helps prevent premature signs of skin aging. The versatile, weightless essence also smoothes, softens the look of fine lines, and refines the appearance of skin, boosting its resilience and vitality.

name: Soy Face Cleanser
info: Fresh Soy Face Cleanser is an extra-gentle gel cleanser that instantly whisks away everyday impurities and make-up - even mascara - without stripping the skin of essential moisture. The multi-tasking formula also works to tone, soothe, and soften the skin for a radiant, healthy-looking complexion.

name: Rose Day Cream Light
info: Dr. Hauschka Rose Day Cream Light offers all the nurturing and protecting properties of the classic Rose Day Cream, but in a lightweight formula that's ideal for sensitive skin or use in warmer weather. Enriched with an expert blend of natural ingredients, including rose water, rose wax and marshmallow, the cream hydrates and balances the skin to leave it feeling soothed, soft and supple.

name: Rose Day Cream
info: Particularly ideal for dry or sensitive skin that is prone to redness, irritation and couperose, Dr. Hauschka Rose Day Cream softens, strengthens and protects your skin whilst calming your complexion. Enriched with precious extracts of rose petals and wild rose hips to nurture and balance your skin, the cream also contains shea butter and rose petal to help your skin retain moisture, whilst marshmallow and St. John's wort hydrate and fortify your complexion. Your skin will be left comforted and harmonised.

name: VIT C Brightening cleanser
info: Wake up skin with a vitamin C enhanced facial cleanser that delivers radiance and helps renew tired looking skin with Rodial Vit C Brightening Cleanser. Designed to brighten skin when it needs a pick-me-up, this gel-based cleanser can be used as part of a daily skincare routine and is formulated with radiance-boosting vitamin C and refreshing blood orange water as well as fruit AHAs that help to exfoliate and renew the skin while reducing the appearance of pores.
